programme.title: Best Baker in America
programme.desc: Cooking competition show in which professional and home bakers compete in a baking tournament. For six weeks, eight skilled bakers are challenged to use their style and technical abilities to make stunning, tasty treats and impress the judges - from macarons, fruit tarts, creme brulee to spectacular and elaborately-decorated cakes. One person gets eliminated every week by the panel of judges, until the final where the best three bakers compete for the grand prize of $25,000 and the title of Best Baker in America.

programme.title: Making History
programme.desc: This program presents an in in-depth exploration of the history of Ukraine, with an emphasis on its most recent past. With opinion and analysis from leading historians, scientists, researchers and eye-witnesses, Making History reveals the complex, and often contradictory, stories from yesteryear that still resonate with todays population. The famous, and not-so-famous, characters who helped shape influential events are all remembered in this show.

programme.title: Goals
programme.desc: "Targets" is a documentary project about the incredible strength of the human spirit. These are sincere confessions of soldiers, medics, and civilians who went through the hell of war, captivity, and severe injuries. Stories about how not to break down when it seems that everything is lost, and how the state helps heroes find their way back to life.

programme.title: Ja es spētu izstāstīt
programme.desc: Denijs Svifts ir pirmās formulas sacīkšu braucējs, taču bez autosporta viņš dievina arī savu skaisto sievu, mazo meitiņu un labāko draugu suni Enzo, kurš nākamajā dzīvē vēlas pārdzimt kā cilvēks. Suņu mīļotāji allaž uzskata, ka viņu suņi ir pilntiesīgi ģimenes locekļi, kuri spēj saprast cilvēku sacīto, izprot notikumus un ir uzticami līdz savai pēdējai stundiņai. Un nudien - tieši tāds suns ir Enzo. Viņa ikdiena lielākoties aizrit, skatoties televīziju un apgūstot visu iespējamo par sava īpašnieka lielāko aizraušanos - braukšanu ar sacīkšu auto. Viņš piedzīvo gan Denija laulības, gan viņu meitas Zojas piedzimšanu. Savas spēcīgās ožas dēļ viņš ir arī pirmais, kurš saprot, ka Denija sievai attīstās smadzeņu vēzis...

programme.title: Gladiators
programme.desc: Ridlijs Skots radījis īstu Holivudas šedevru, satraucošu, vēsturiski episku, vērienīgu un iespaidīgu filmu par otrā gadsimta Romu. Romiešu ģenerālis Maksims vada karapulku, lai impērijai iekarotu ģermāņu zemes. Kad novecojošais Marks Aurēlijs Maksimam pavēsta, ka gribētu pēc nāves atstāt Romas valdīšanu viņa rokās, izceļas konflikts starp drosmīgo un pievilcīgo kareivi, kurš vēlas atgriezties savā lauku sētā pie sievas un dēla, un imperatora vienīgo, varaskāro, skaudīgo un viltīgo dēlu Kommodu. Savulaik Maksimu kā vergu nopircis spekulants Proksimo, un nu Maksimam ringā jāuzvar vai jākrīt. Viņš cīnās ne tikai par savu dzīvību, bet par visu impēriju, ko viņš mīl un godā. No 12 "Oskara" nominācijām filma saņēmusi piecas balvas.

programme.title: Kentervilas spoks
programme.desc: Sera Saimona de Kentervila rēgs jau 300 gadus klīst pa savrupmāju, meklēdams drosmīgu pēcnācēju, kurš viņu varētu atbrīvot no lāsta.

programme.title: Krauklis
programme.desc: Dvēseles radinieki Ēriks Dravens un Šellija Vēbstere tiek nežēlīgi nogalināti. Saņemot iespēju upurēt sevi un glābt savu mūža mīlestību, Ēriks dodas ceļā, šķērsojot dzīvo un mirušo pasauli, lai atriebtos un izcīnītu taisnību.

programme.title: Rūķi
programme.desc: Hloja un viņas mamma pārvācas – jau ATKAL! Turklāt viņas pārvācas uz necilu, vecu māju, kas pilna ar dārza rūķiem. Drīz Hloja gan atklāj, ka šī māja slēpj biedējošu noslēpumu. Kādu dienu pēc skolas Hloja kopā ar kaimiņu Liamu atklāj, ka rūķi patiesībā ir dzīvi! Kā izrādās, jau gadiem rūķi ir sargājuši planētu no draudīgiem maziem monstriem, kuri iebrukuši mājā caur portālu, kas ved uz citu pasauli. Kad vienīgais līdzeklis, kas varētu palīdzēt uzveikt monstrus, skolā nonāk nepareizajās rokās, Hlojai un Liamam jāsadarbojas ar rūķiem, lai cīnītos pret mazo negantnieku iebrukumu un glābtu pasauli!

programme.title: Kapteinis Zobenzobs un burvju briljants
programme.desc: Ļaunais princis Megans Hans no džungļiem un Karību jūras pirāts kapteinis Zobenzobs jau sen dzen maģiskā briljanta pēdas. Tas nav parasts dārgakmens. Pusnaktī tas spēj piepildīt viskvēlāko vēlēšanos, lai kāda tā būtu. Visi meklējumi "kaķim zem astes", taču tad, klejodams pa džungļiem, burvju dārgakmeni nejauši ierauga mazais Marks.

programme.title: Madagaskaras pingvīni
programme.desc: Bezbailīgie pingvīni Kapteinis, Kovalskis, Riko un Ierindnieks, kuri ir labākie spiegi, kādi jebkad izšķīlušies no olas, apvieno spēkus ar smalku slepeno organizāciju "Ziemeļvējš". Izskatīgā un brašā aģenta Slepenā vadībā viņiem kopā jāaptur ļaunais doktors Oktāvijs Brīze, kurš ir nodomājis iznīcināt pasauli.

programme.title: Pavadonis
programme.desc: Lai pārdzīvotu vispārējo kāzu drudzi, kas pārņēmis vasaru, divi neprecēti draugi Bens un Alise nolemj būt viens otra pavadoņi katrās kāzās, kurās viņi ir ielūgti.

programme.title: Van Gogs. Pie mūžības vārtiem
programme.desc: Gleznotāja Van Goga dzīvesstāsts par laiku, ko viņš pavadīja Francijā, Arlā.

programme.title: Lepnā princese
programme.desc: Jaunajam un izskatīgajam karalim Bendžaminam ir pienācis laiks precēties. Viņu savaldzina princeses Karolīnas portrets. Kad princese viņu atraida, karalis, pārģērbies par dārznieku, iekļūst Karolīnas pilī un iekaro viņas sirdi.

programme.title: Rozalīna
programme.desc: Ikviens zina stāstu par Romeo un Džuljetu. Taču šajā stāstā iztrūkst kāda svarīga nianse – pirms Džuljetas bija viņas māsīca Rozalīna. Rozalīna ir līdz ausīm iemīlējusies Romeo un ir pārliecināta, ka abi ir kā radīti viens otram. Gadiem ilgi Rozalīna sapņo, kaut Romeo viņu noskūpstītu, un tad tas patiešām notiek! Viss šķiet ideāli, taču tad viņas māsīca Džuljeta pārceļas atpakaļ uz pilsētu un iekaro Romeo sirdi. Un tas vēl nav viss – Rozalīna uzzina par Džuljetas un Romeo pašnāvības plāniem. Vai viņa pagūs abus apturēt?

programme.title: Viņš ir viņa
programme.desc: Ļoti brīva Šekspīra lugas "Divpadsmitā nakts" ekranizācija. Pārvācoties uz citu skolu, Viola maina arī savu izskatu un uzdodas par savu dvīņubrāli Sebastjanu, kurš pats pārcēlies uz Londonu. Taču meitene nemaz nenojauš, ka viņu gaida pārsteigums, – viņa iemīlēsies savā istabas biedrā un skolas karstākajā puisī Djūkā, kura sirds savukārt pieder skaistulei Olīvijai. Taču šī meitene ir pamanījusi Sebastjanu – emocionālo puisi, kādi viņai vienmēr patikuši. Un, kaut arī šķiet, ka nekas nevar būt vēl trakāk, ierodas īstais Sebastjans, kurš nemaz nenojauš, ka viņu aizvieto paša dvīņu māsa!

programme.title: Mīluļu slepenā dzīve
programme.desc: Makss (Luiss Sīkejs) ir enerģisks un sajūsmināts Džeka Rasela terjers, kurš dzīvo Manhetenas dzīvoklī kopā ar īpašnieci Keitiju (Elija Kempere). Taču viņa laimīgā dzīve pārtrūkst, kad saimniece pieņem jaunu suni Grāfu (Ēriks Stounstrīts). Makss apņemas atgūt saimnieces uzmanību tikai sev un mēģina Grāfu atstāt kādā sānielā, taču viņus ielenc kaķu banda, kuru vada Ozons (Stīvs Kūgans). Viņi tik tikko izglābj savas dzīvības, kad nākas saskarties ar pamesto dzīvnieku armijas niknumu apburošā, bet psihiski nelīdzsvarotā truša Sniegapikas (Kevins Hārts) vadībā. Šis ir Ņujorkas piedzīvojums, kurš liek Maksam un Grāfam izvērtēt savu sacensību un mēģināt izjaukt Sniegapikas atriebes plānu pret visiem dzīvnieku īpašniekiem Ņujorkā.

programme.title: Bubulis
programme.desc: Šausmu karaļa Stīvena Kinga darba ekranizējums: pēc mātes nāves Seidija un Sojera ļaujas sērām, kamēr abu tēvs Hārpers pūlas, lai viss atgrieztos ikdienišķās sliedēs. Kādu dienu Hārperu viņa psihoterapijas praksē apmeklē pacients un izstāsta par noslēpumaino Bubuli, kurš it kā nogalinājis viņa bērnus. Neilgi pēc tam viņš Hārperu mājā izdara pašnāvību, un drīz vien māsas sāk vajāt pārdabiska būtne.

programme.title: Ex Machina
programme.desc: Jaunais programmētājs Kalebs Smits laimē darba loterijā un saņem priekšnieka piedāvājumu apmeklēt viņa pētniecības centru. Pēc ierašanās un tikšanās ar Nātanu Kalebs uzzina, ka Nātans izstrādā mākslīgo intelektu. Šefs piedāvā Kalebam piedalīties tā sauktajā "Tjūringa testā". Tā Kalebs iepazīstas ar Avu - robotu ar mākslīgo intelektu. Ar katru sesiju Ava Kalebam kļūst arvien tuvāka un skaidrāka. Saziņa ar robotu liek viņam aizdomāties - kas patiesībā testē, kas ar ko manipulē un kas ir viņš pats? Un, ja aiz visa slēpjas mākslīgais intelekts, tad, protams, - "Tjūringa tests" ir izturēts.....

programme.title: Svaigs
programme.desc: Kad kārtējais randiņš beidzas neveiksmīgi, Noa ir gatava iepazīšanās procesam atmest ar roku. Taču tad viņa satiek Stīvu – un nevis iepazīšanās vietnē, bet vecmodīgā veidā, pie dārzeņu plaukta lielveikalā! Plastikas ķirurgs Stīvs atgriež viņā cerības, ka bruņnieciskums vīriešos nav miris. Svaigi iemīlējusies meitene nepagūst pat aizdomāties, vai Stīvs gadījumā nav pārāk labs, kad ir jau par vēlu. Noa pārliecība, ka meitenes vīriešiem ir kā svaiga gaļa, apstiprinās visšaušalīgākajā veidā.

programme.title: "Back to Black"
programme.desc: Filma "Back to Black" ir stāsts par 21.gs. zvaigzni Eimiju Vainhausu no pusaudzes gadiem līdz pasaulslavenā albuma "Back to Black" tapšanai, atklājot neatkārtojamo radošo dzirksti, asprātību un atklātību, kā arī cenšoties izprast viņas dēmonus. Albums "Back To Black" ieguva 5 Grammy balvas, un ir viens no visvairāk pārdotajiem albumiem. Tajā ir Eimijas sirdspuksti, skaļāki ar katru sirdssāpi, katra dziesma ir viņas un Bleika mīlas stāsts.

programme.title: Trakās ķepas. Leģenda par Henku
programme.desc: Henks varbūt ir necils suns, taču viņš ir apņēmības pilns kļūt par samuraju. Suņuks dodas uz valsti, kur čum un mudž no kaķiem. Tur Henks satiek nejauko kaķu karavadoni Iku Ču un arī Džimbo, kurš reiz bijis varens samurajs. Džimbo paņem Henku savā paspārnē un iemāca viņam, ko īsti nozīmē būt samurajam. Dzimstot pirmajai īstajai draudzībai starp kaķi un suni, abiem nākas glābt Kakamučo no ļaunā Ika Ču.

programme.title: Ķieģeli pa ķieģelītim
programme.desc: Animācijas filma "Lego" klucīšu stilā par Farela Viljamsa dzīvi. Filmā, kurā galvenās lomas ierunājis pats Farels Viljamss (Pharrell Williams), kā arī Kendriks Lamārs (Kendrick Lamar) un Džastins Timberleiks (Justin Timberlake), ķieģelīti pa ķieģelītim tiek pārskatīta mākslinieka karjera.

programme.title: Amerikas maģisko melnādaino biedrība
programme.desc: Jauns vīrietis tiek uzņemts noslēpumainā biedrībā, kurā darbojas maģiski melnādainie cilvēki, kas veltī savu dzīvi augstākā mērķa īstenošanai: atvieglot baltajiem cilvēkiem dzīvi.

programme.title: Ingrīda - pašiņu karaliene
programme.desc: Ingrīda (Obrija Plaza) ir īstena sociālo tīklu stalkere, kuras dzīvē viens nejauši nospiests LIKE jau ir pielīdzināms īstai draudzībai, pat ja otra puse par to nemaz nenojauš. Teilore Slouna (Elizabete Olsena) ir atzīta Losandželosas sociālo tīklu karaliene un Instagrama zvaigzne, kuras līdz pēdējam pikselim noslīpētā, perfektā dzīve kļūst par Ingrīdas jaunāko apsēstību. Kad Ingrīda ar viltu ienāk Teilores dzīvē, viņu attiecības no #BFF ātri vien kļūst par #WTF. Un tas ir tikai sākums...

programme.title: Ugunīgi ass
programme.desc: Iedvesmojošs stāsts par Ričardu Montanezu, uzkodu ražotāja "Frito Lay" apkopēju, kurš, pateicoties savai meksikāņu izcelsmei, palīdzēja sapurināt pārtikas industriju, palīdzot radīt vienus no visu laiku populārākajiem čipsiem "Flamin Hot Cheetos".

programme.title: Varenais Ričards
programme.desc: Zvirbulis Ričijs kopš dzimšanas pieņemts stārķu ģimenē, visi viņu ļoti mīl, viņš ātri aug un jūtas kā īsts stārķis. Taču gājputniem stārķiem pienāk laiks lidot uz Āfriku, lai tur ziemotu. Ģimene ir spiesta atklāt Ričijam viņa izcelšanos, jo lidot kopā nedrīkst – grūtajā ceļojumā zvirbulis var iet bojā. Drosminieks negrasās nolaist spārnus un nolemj visiem pierādīt, ka ir īsts stārķis. Ričijs viens pats dodas ceļā, un viņam pievienojas jauni draugi – pūce Olga un papagailis Kiki.

programme.title: Varenais Ričards
programme.desc: Ričards ir jauns zvirbulēns, kuru savā lokā pieņēmusi stārķu ģimene. Viņš pavada ziemu Āfrikas ziemeļos, taču ir pienācis laiks atgriezties mājās. Ričards vēlas vadīt gājputnu kāsi, bet šim uzdevumam tiek izraudzīts viņa pusbrālis Makss. Jaunais putnēns jūtas aizvainots, taču drīz sākas vētrains piedzīvojums. Tirāniskais pāvs Zamano sagūsta Ričarda draugu. Zamano atsakās viņu laist brīvībā, kamēr Ričards neatrisinās mīklu un neatradīs Zamano dārgakmeni.

programme.title: Pie visa vainīga mīlestība
programme.desc: Žoslēns ir veiksmīgs biznesmenis, toties mīlas dzīvē – patmīlīgs brunču mednieks. Kad viņš mēģina jau atkal savaldzināt jaunu sievieti, izliekoties, ka ir ratiņkrēslā, viņa iepazīstina Žoslēnu ar savu māsu, kura patiešām piesaistīta dzīvei ratiņkrēslā.

programme.title: Balerīna
programme.desc: Slepkava, apmācīta Ruska Roma organizācijas tradīcijās, dodas atriebt tēva nāvi.

programme.title: Cietais rieksts
programme.desc: 1988. gadā "Oskaram" nominētās cikla pirmās filmas turpinājums. Ņujorkas policists, tagad Losandželosas policijas darbinieks, Džons Makleins lidostā gaida savu sievu, kad pēkšņi ēkā iebrūk bruņoti tipi, kuri vēlas izglābt narkotirgoni, kas ir nogādāts ASV, lai tur stātos tiesas priekšā. Jau atkal Makleins iesaistās teroristu plānos, kurus izjaukt spēj tikai viņš…

programme.title: Lielais attālums
programme.desc: Kosmosa kuģirs avarē uz svešas planētas. Izdzīvojušajam astronautam jāšķērso skarbā planēta! Bēgot no nezināmām radībām, viņam jācenšas neiztērēt visu skābekli. Vienīgais kas viņu dzen uz priekšu, ir cerība satikt otru izdzīvojušo.

programme.title: Kliko kundze
programme.desc: Pēc vīra pāragrās nāves Barba Nikola Ponsardēna Kliko pretstatā pieņemtajām normām pārņem jaunā vīndarīšanas uzņēmuma grožus, ko abi ar vīru bija veidojuši. Vadot uzņēmumu cauri politiskām un finanšu grūtībām, viņa ignorē kritiķus un rada revolūciju šampanieša industrijā, kļūstot par vienu no pasaules pirmajām, dižajām darījumu sievietēm. Filmas pamatā ir Tilaras Dž. Maceo "The New York Times" bestsellers "Atraitne Kliko".

programme.title: EuroLeague. Virtus Bologna - Fenerbahce Beko Istanbul
programme.desc: The EuroLeague is the top-tier European professional basketball club competition since 2000. The competition replaced the FIBA EuroLeague (which was previously called the FIBA European Champions Cup, or simply the European Cup), which had been run by FIBA since 1958. Starting from 2010/2011 season the tournament is named Turkish Airlines Euroleague, due to a sponsorship contract of Turkish Airlines with EuroLeague, and in 2013 the contract was prolonged to 2020. The tournament is aired in 199 countries of the world. The current EuroLeague structure is made up of 16 teams, which each play each other twice, once at home and once away, in a double round robin league regular season, each team plays 30 games. The top 8 placed teams at the end of the regular season advance to playoffs, each plays a 5 game playoff series against a single opponent. The winners of each playoff series advance to the Final Four held in a predetermined city for two days. The Final Four features two semifinals, a third place game, and the championship game, all on the same weekend.

programme.title: NBA. Charlotte Hornets - Cleveland Cavaliers
programme.desc: The National Basketball Association composes of thirty teams across North America for men who are professional in this specific sport. Due to its popularity, this is one of four major professional sport leagues available in the United States of America and Canada. Furthermore, research suggests that it is widely considered to be the premier mens basketball league in the world. Legends of this particular sport include Kobe Bryant, Michael Jordan and Kareem Abdul-Jabbar.

programme.title: Futbols: Bundesliga. Dortmund - St. Pauli
programme.desc: Germany has the most attended football league in the world, in the Bundesliga. We bring these authentic fab experiences to your living room with all the key moments of the 2019-20 season, to ensure that your appetite for German football is well and truly met. The likes of Borussia Dortmund and Bayern Munich are met with stern competition this season, as RB Leipzig look to build on their third-placed finish from last season. This programme brings all the games of the german top-flight into one place, so that you can easily catch up with the weeks action. As we reach the business end-of-the-season, watch the victors and losers dictate the final table. With relegation spots and Champions League places yet to be decided, it promises to be a rather exciting conclusion for all those concerned.

programme.title: Futbols: LaLiga. Real Sociedad - Barcelona
programme.desc: La Liga (The Campeonato Nacional de Liga de Primera Division) is the mens top professional football division of the Spanish football league system. It is administered by the National Professional Football League and has 20 contestants, with the three lowest-placed teams at the end of each season relegated to the Segunda Division and replaced by the top two teams and a play-off winner in that division. Nine teams have become champions, Real Madrid has got the title 33 times and FC Barcelona 26 times. La Liga is one of the most popular professional sports leagues in the world and the top league in Europe over the last five years.

programme.title: Basketbols: Eirolīga. Anadolu Efes - Olympiacos
programme.desc: The EuroLeague is the top-tier European professional basketball club competition since 2000. The competition replaced the FIBA EuroLeague (which was previously called the FIBA European Champions Cup, or simply the European Cup), which had been run by FIBA since 1958. Starting from 2010/2011 season the tournament is named Turkish Airlines Euroleague, due to a sponsorship contract of Turkish Airlines with EuroLeague, and in 2013 the contract was prolonged to 2020. The tournament is aired in 199 countries of the world. The current EuroLeague structure is made up of 16 teams, which each play each other twice, once at home and once away, in a double round robin league regular season, each team plays 30 games. The top 8 placed teams at the end of the regular season advance to playoffs, each plays a 5 game playoff series against a single opponent. The winners of each playoff series advance to the Final Four held in a predetermined city for two days. The Final Four features two semifinals, a third place game, and the championship game, all on the same weekend.

programme.title: UFC Žurnāls. Laika atskaite: Justin Gaethje-Paddy Pimblett
programme.desc: Martial Arts based TV programme. UFC stands for the Ultimate Fighting Championship which is an American mixed martial arts (MMA) promotion company based in Las Vegas that is owned by William Morris Endeavour.The purpose of UFC fighting was to establish the most effective martial art in a contest that had no weight classes and minimal rules that were as follows: no biting, hair pulling, groin shots and eye gouging. Legendary fighters well known for their ability to win in UFC fighting are Anderson Silva, Brock Lesnar, Connor McGregor and Ken Shamrock. Womens MMA has seen Ronda Rousey defend her title from 2012 to 2015 before she was defeated by Holly Holm another belt holder in more than one martial art.

programme.title: The Flip Off
programme.desc: Tarek El Moussa and Christina Haack built a home-flipping empire and top HGTV series with Flip or Flop—but it all came crashing down after their much-publicized divorce. Now, Tarek and Christina are back in the networks new highly anticipated series The Flip Off, a throwdown competition to see which ex can find, buy, renovate and flip a house for the biggest financial gain.

programme.title: Caribbean Life
programme.desc: The lure of the Caribbeans idyllic beaches, fabulous climate and laidback approach to life is too much for many mainland Americans to dismiss. Caribbean Life follows house-hunting couples and families as they seek to buy their own slice of paradise, in the form of a glorious home in an astonishingly beautiful location. With the help of real estate advisors they choose the properties that best suit their needs and budgets, before deciding if its time to leave the states and start anew. Paradise doesnt have to be expensive, as the prospective buyers soon realise.

programme.title: My Lottery Dream Home
programme.desc: Recent lottery winners look for their perfect dream house in this "House Hunters"-inspired reality show. David Bromstad takes recent lottery winners on over-the-top house hunts for their new dream homes. Whether they win hundreds of thousands or hundreds of millions, lucky lottery winners everywhere are jumping headfirst into the real estate market. Will they spend all their winnings on an extravagant mansion or settle for a humble sound investment? Find out what happens when average Americans set out to find "My Lottery Dream Home".

programme.title: House Hunters
programme.desc: American reality series following host Suzanne Whang on her quest to help people relocate in search of their dream home. programme.title: Flip or Flop
programme.desc: Tarek is a self-proclaimed real estate genius with determination and drive. Christina is Tareks picture-perfect wife, who Tareks friends still cant believe he landed. In each episode of "Flip or Flop", Tarek and Christina flip a new property. From the nail-biting purchase at auction, to the frustrating renovations and maddening showings, to the giddy acceptance of an offer, well follow along as these two relatively novice flippers try their hand at the toughest game in town. programme.title: Mexico Life
programme.desc: Mexico is a country unlike many others; gorgeous climate, a Caribbean coastline, vibrant cities, and unimaginable history. programme.title: Build Me Up
programme.desc: Forgetting your ex isnt so easy when your whole house reminds you of them. Everywhere you turn, theres that horrible wall paper they insisted on getting, pictures of your holidays together, they even painted your front door their favourite colour. Thats where designer Orlando Soria comes in. Orlando considers himself somewhat a break-up expert, and hes determined to give these newly single clients houses the new lease of life that they so desperately need, allowing them to move on from their ex.

programme.title: Chasing the West
programme.desc: An air traffic controller and his family look for a peaceful retreat, and an Olympic hopeful risks everything to launch an equestrian business.

programme.title: Renovation
programme.desc: A cracked toilet floods a familys home while theyre on vacation. Lindsey and Kirsten restore and remodel their kitchen, bathroom, and nursery.

programme.title: Vacation House for Free
programme.desc: Matt Blashaw realizes couples wishes to own a vacation home mortgage free. The secret? He helps them shop for and renovate a "diamond in the rough" home in their dream location to command top dollar as a vacation rental. The end result? The couple rents out the renovated home for maximum income part of the year, covering all their annual expenses. For the rest of the year they live in a Vacation House for Free!

programme.title: My Lottery Dream Home
programme.desc: Recent lottery winners look for their perfect dream house in this "House Hunters"-inspired reality show. David Bromstad takes recent lottery winners on over-the-top house hunts for their new dream homes. Whether they win hundreds of thousands or hundreds of millions, lucky lottery winners everywhere are jumping headfirst into the real estate market. Will they spend all their winnings on an extravagant mansion or settle for a humble sound investment? Find out what happens when average Americans set out to find "My Lottery Dream Home".

programme.title: My Lottery Dream Home
programme.desc: Recent lottery winners look for their perfect dream house in this "House Hunters"-inspired reality show. Will they spend all their winnings on an extravagant mansion or settle for a humble sound investment? Find out what happens when average Americans set out to find "My Lottery Dream Home".

programme.title: Unsellable Houses
programme.desc: Real estate consultants and twin sisters Leslie Davis and Lyndsay Lamb have a knack for helping desperate homeowners sell their lifeless homes. After visiting nearby comparables, the sisters make the necessary, impactful renovations that convert these unlovable houses into diamonds in the rough.

programme.title: Fixer To Fabulous
programme.desc: A husband-and-wife restoration team revive and sell historic houses in their hometown of Bentonville, Arkansas. Dave and Jenny Marrs are both deeply passionate about preserving Bentonvilles examples of aged architecture. They see endless potential in these dilapidated properties, each of which is full of character. Unfortunately for Dave and Jenny, theyre also full of problems! Watch as they transform the homes from fixer to fabulous. Reality series.

programme.title: Castle Impossible
programme.desc: After creating their renovated bedroom in the Bell Tower, Daphne and Ian transform a water-damaged room into a bathing chamber worthy of royalty.

programme.title: Living Aloha
programme.desc: After a year-long wait, Kamohai and Tristyn face a never-ending nightmare after squatters take over a property in Waipahu, causing chaos and delays.

programme.title: Chasing the West
programme.desc: An air traffic controller and his family look for a peaceful retreat, and an Olympic hopeful risks everything to launch an equestrian business.

programme.title: Fix My Frankenhouse
programme.desc: Mike and Denese take on one of their most eclectic houses yet with a fridge in the living room, an unusable kitchen and a hidden walled-off fireplace.

programme.title: Caribbean Life
programme.desc: The lure of the Caribbeans idyllic beaches, fabulous climate and laidback approach to life is too much for many mainland Americans to dismiss. Caribbean Life follows house-hunting couples and families as they seek to buy their own slice of paradise, in the form of a glorious home in an astonishingly beautiful location. With the help of real estate advisors they choose the properties that best suit their needs and budgets, before deciding if its time to leave the states and start anew. Paradise doesnt have to be expensive, as the prospective buyers soon realise.

programme.title: Beachfront Bargain Hunt
programme.desc: Attempting to bring families dreams come to life, but on a budget, Beachfront Bargain Hunt shows that you dont have to be a millionaire if you want to live a life by the sea! Narrated by John Beach, this show follows a number of couples, families and people looking just for themselves exploring various beachfronts in USA, looking for homes that wont break the bank. Ensuring each person gets what they want, they are introduced to a number of properties that meet their ultimate dream home in the hopes that they will indeed find the one. With 101 episodes, Beachfront Bargain Hunt introduces you to the life that can be led, without breaking to bank, to live a life by the sea!

programme.title: House Hunters
programme.desc: American reality series following host Suzanne Whang on her quest to help people relocate in search of their dream home. Follow the individuals, couples and families in an international search for their perfect property, exploring a stunning selection of homes chosen just for them. With three potential candidates to choose from, join them as they try and make the difficult decision to start a new life abroad. Revisit the new homeowners at the end of each episode to see how their properties have developed and how life has changed for them since the move.

programme.title: Bradley Walsh: Egypts Cosmic Code
programme.desc: In this second episode, Bradley continues his journey through Egypt to unravel the mysteries of the GREAT SPHINX before descending underground into the enigmatic SERAPEUM with its precision-cut giant granite sarcophagi.

programme.title: The UnBelievable with Dan Aykroyd
programme.desc: This episode explores the strangest and most ghastly gigs ever. From night soil men cleaning excrement off the streets of Victorian London to professional mourners hired to weep at funerals.

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: Long before banks, ATMs and check-cashing services, there were pawn shops. Pawning was the leading form of consumer credit in the United States until the 1950s, and pawn shops are still helping everyday people make ends meet. "Pawn Stars" takes you inside the colorful world of the pawn business. At the Gold and Silver Pawn Shop on the outskirts of Las Vegas, three generations of the Harrison family — grandfather Richard, son Rick and grandson Corey — jointly run the family business, and theres clashing and camaraderie every step of the way. The three men use their sharp eyes and skills to assess the value of items from the commonplace to the truly historic, including a 16th-century samurai sword, a Super Bowl ring, a Picasso painting and a 17th-century stay of execution. Its up to them to determine whats real and whats fake, as they reveal the often surprising answer to the questions on everyones mind, "Whats the story behind it?" and "Whats it worth?"

programme.title: The Curse of Oak Island
programme.desc: For over two centuries, teams of searchers, including Franklin D. Roosevelt, have attempted to crack the code that will unearth the treasure believed to be buried on the small island off the coast of Nova Scotia. Armed with the knowledge of those that came before them, the muscle of heavy machinery and decades of engineering know-how, brothers Rick and Marty Lagina and their partners may be closer than anyone in history to finding the treasure that has so far claimed the lives of six men.

programme.title: The UnXplained with William Shatner
programme.desc: From the producers of Ancient Aliens® and The Curse of Oak Island® From alleged UFO encounters to sudden disappearances to evil possessions, series host William Shatner attempts to get to the truth behind the most bizarre and mysterious events ever reported. With the help of the worlds top scientists, first-hand "experiencer" accounts, and dramatic reenactments, viewers gain shocking insight into whats really happening--and why.

programme.title: Pawn Stars Do America
programme.desc: Rick, Corey, and Chum are making big deals in the smallest state! In Providence, Rhode Island, the guys cruise over to a muscle car collection, check out a rare book written by John Adams, and take aim at a harpoon gun.

programme.title: Pawn Stars Do America
programme.desc: Rick, Corey, and Chum are hitting the road to look for treasures in Tampa, Florida. Helming a crew of experts, the guys will plunder everything from Pokemon cards to Steve McQueens motorcycle, hoping to make waves in the Sunshine State.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens: The Ultimate Evidence
programme.desc: One of the most prolific inventors of the 20th century, Nikola Tesla shepherded mankind to a new industrial era and laid the groundwork for todays technological age. Is it possible that he was influenced by some otherworldly design?

programme.title: Bradley Walsh: Egypts Cosmic Code
programme.desc: In this second episode, Bradley continues his journey through Egypt to unravel the mysteries of the GREAT SPHINX before descending underground into the enigmatic SERAPEUM with its precision-cut giant granite sarcophagi.

programme.title: The Secret of Skinwalker Ranch
programme.desc: Rivaling the famous Area 51 in Nevada for UFO sightings and paramormal activity, is the lesser known, but equally fascinating, Uinta Basin in Utah and, in particular, Skinwalker Ranch. For the first time, a team of scientists and experts have been granted unlimited access to the infamous and secretive 512-acre property in order to unlock the mysteries of more than 200 years of UFO activity, bizarre animal mutations and preternatural phenomena. Making good use of state-of-the-art tecnology such as drone thermography, ground-penetrating radar and lasers, the team apply their knowledge and expertise to make shocking discoveries.

programme.desc: Are reports of a strange swirling vortex with a brilliant white center in the skies over Oklahoma proof of a genuine UFO? Does a video claimed to be discovered sealed in Vatican archives, show a real case of demonic possession?

programme.desc: Are reports of a strange swirling vortex with a brilliant white center in the skies over Oklahoma proof of a genuine UFO? Does a video claimed to be discovered sealed in Vatican archives, show a real case of demonic possession?

programme.title: The Secret of Skinwalker Ranch
programme.desc: Rivaling the famous Area 51 in Nevada for UFO sightings and paramormal activity, is the lesser known, but equally fascinating, Uinta Basin in Utah and, in particular, Skinwalker Ranch. For the first time, a team of scientists and experts have been granted unlimited access to the infamous and secretive 512-acre property in order to unlock the mysteries of more than 200 years of UFO activity, bizarre animal mutations and preternatural phenomena. Making good use of state-of-the-art tecnology such as drone thermography, ground-penetrating radar and lasers, the team apply their knowledge and expertise to make shocking discoveries.

programme.title: The Curse of Oak Island
programme.desc: For over two centuries, teams of searchers, including Franklin D. Roosevelt, have attempted to crack the code that will unearth the treasure believed to be buried on the small island off the coast of Nova Scotia. Armed with the knowledge of those that came before them, the muscle of heavy machinery and decades of engineering know-how, brothers Rick and Marty Lagina and their partners may be closer than anyone in history to finding the treasure that has so far claimed the lives of six men.

programme.title: The UnXplained with William Shatner
programme.desc: From the producers of Ancient Aliens® and The Curse of Oak Island® From alleged UFO encounters to sudden disappearances to evil possessions, series host William Shatner attempts to get to the truth behind the most bizarre and mysterious events ever reported. With the help of the worlds top scientists, first-hand "experiencer" accounts, and dramatic reenactments, viewers gain shocking insight into whats really happening--and why.

programme.title: Pawn Stars Do America
programme.desc: The hunt for extraordinary deals heats up as Rick, Corey, and Chum make their way down to Mesa, Arizona. Rick encounters a rugged Big Willy Jeep, Chum fangirls over some 2010 Justin Bieber trading cards, and Corey is struck by some Napoleonic medals.

programme.title: Pawn Stars Do America
programme.desc: Rick, Corey, and Chum explore the Wolverines lair, facing mishaps with a Thunderbird, winning a "Star Wars" collection with the force, and snagging a signed jersey from football legend LaMarr Woodley, who later surprises them.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: ANCIENT ALIENS examines 75 million years of the most credible alien evidence here on Earth, from the age of the dinosaurs, to ancient Egypt, to the skies over the western desert in the present day US. Ancient cave drawings of strange creatures, an asphalt-like substance in an Egyptian pyramid made from the remains of unidentified creatures, continued mass sightings in the USA -- these are just a few of the strange stories that will be investigated.

programme.title: Forged in Fire
programme.desc: Forged in Fire, an American competition series aired on the History Channel, challenges four new competitors to produce a knife in their own style with a small variety of metal objects to create from. The series, hosted by Wil Willis, consists of a three-round elimination contest to forge bladed weapons, with the final winner receiving $10,000 and the days championship title. Judged by experts in weapon history and use, the last two people standing must create in their own forge a Moro Kris sword, a blade which dates back to 300BC, in just five days. Filmed in Brooklyn, New York, the set referred to as "The Forge" sets the scene for this suspenseful show with propane forges, power hammers and hydraulic presses, with medical personnel being close by to treat any injuries or other health problems. If the medical personnel suspect that the competitors are unable to continue safely, they will be disqualified. Once each competitor has created their weapon, it will be put through a series of tests including chopping/slashing/stabbing objects such as ropes, ice blocks, animal carcasses and steel car doors. Having to meet a number of criterias, the smiths battle it out, without their swords, to become the best black-smith.

programme.title: The Proof Is Out There
programme.desc: Did a film crew discover proof of a dinosaur living in the African Congo? Are reports of the strange lights above the Hessdalen Valley in Norway a sign of extraterrestrial activity? And has NASA uncovered proof of an alien structure on an asteroid?

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: ANCIENT ALIENS examines 75 million years of the most credible alien evidence here on Earth, from the age of the dinosaurs, to ancient Egypt, to the skies over the western desert in the present day US. Ancient cave drawings of strange creatures, an asphalt-like substance in an Egyptian pyramid made from the remains of unidentified creatures, continued mass sightings in the USA -- these are just a few of the strange stories that will be investigated.

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: Long before banks, ATMs and check-cashing services, there were pawn shops. Pawning was the leading form of consumer credit in the United States until the 1950s, and pawn shops are still helping everyday people make ends meet. "Pawn Stars" takes you inside the colorful world of the pawn business. At the Gold and Silver Pawn Shop on the outskirts of Las Vegas, three generations of the Harrison family — grandfather Richard, son Rick and grandson Corey — jointly run the family business, and theres clashing and camaraderie every step of the way. The three men use their sharp eyes and skills to assess the value of items from the commonplace to the truly historic, including a 16th-century samurai sword, a Super Bowl ring, a Picasso painting and a 17th-century stay of execution. Its up to them to determine whats real and whats fake, as they reveal the often surprising answer to the questions on everyones mind, "Whats the story behind it?" and "Whats it worth?"

programme.title: The Curse of Oak Island
programme.desc: For over two centuries, teams of searchers, including Franklin D. Roosevelt, have attempted to crack the code that will unearth the treasure believed to be buried on the small island off the coast of Nova Scotia. Armed with the knowledge of those that came before them, the muscle of heavy machinery and decades of engineering know-how, brothers Rick and Marty Lagina and their partners may be closer than anyone in history to finding the treasure that has so far claimed the lives of six men.

With the help of the worlds top scientists, first-hand "experiencer" accounts, and dramatic reenactments, viewers gain shocking insight into whats really happening--and why.

programme.title: Pawn Stars Do America
programme.desc: Rick, Corey, and Chum explore the Wolverines lair, facing mishaps with a Thunderbird, winning a "Star Wars" collection with the force, and snagging a signed jersey from football legend LaMarr Woodley, who later surprises them.

programme.title: Forged in Fire
programme.desc: Forged in Fire, an American competition series aired on the History Channel, challenges four new competitors to produce a knife in their own style with a small variety of metal objects to create from. The series, hosted by Wil Willis, consists of a three-round elimination contest to forge bladed weapons, with the final winner receiving $10,000 and the days championship title. If the medical personnel suspect that the competitors are unable to continue safely, they will be disqualified. Once each competitor has created their weapon, it will be put through a series of tests including chopping/slashing/stabbing objects such as ropes, ice blocks, animal carcasses and steel car doors. Having to meet a number of criterias, the smiths battle it out, without their swords, to become the best black-smith.

programme.title: Serial Killer Earth
programme.desc: Gripping and unsettling documentary series that features a team of experts who in each episode examine various footage from news and home video, as well as eyewitness testimony, in order to explain, understand and inform viewers of what actually happened during some of the most devastating natural disasters- including Hurricane Katrina, the earthquake and tsunami that devastated Japan, a monstrous earthquake in Haiti, avalanche of rocks and debris that destroyed a village in Honduras, and many other hurricanes, earthquakes, tsunamis, floodings, droughts and devastating forest fires. They will also investigate how these recent disasters compare and contrast with the most historic natural disasters of the past.

programme.title: The Curse of Civil War Gold
programme.desc: Treasure hunters Rick and Marty Lagina, the stars of Historys "The Curse of Oak Island," learn of a new mystery that may even rival Oak Islands. Michigan native Kevin Dykstra is obsessed with a deathbed confession made by a lighthouse keeper in the 1890s about a national treasure dating back to the Civil War. The story goes that Union soldiers tracked down Confederate president Jefferson Davis in 1865 and confiscated his gold. The stolen loot was smuggled north some years later but ended up in Lake Michigan, where Dykstra believes it still remains. His quest to prove it ultimately takes him and his team to the bottom of Lake Michigan.

programme.title: Digging for the Truth
programme.desc: An intriguing exploration of some of the most incredible ancient mysteries located all around the world. The presenter questions the existing theories on the subjects, talks to experts and gives his own hypothesis on what could have happened. Join this amazing historical journey as iconic mysteries such as the Egyptian pyramids, the Holy Grail and the Lost Ark of the Covenent are explored.

programme.title: UFO Hunters
programme.desc: The teams access to UFO evidence is unparalleled and their expertise allows them to quickly identify bogus claims of UFOs. Together, they use eyewitness accounts, scientific experimentation, documents recently released through the Freedom of Information Act and footage that has never been seen before on television to piece together compelling — and at times chilling — evidence of UFO phenomena. Join UFO Hunters Bill Birnes, Pat Uskert, Dr. Ted Acworth, and Jeff Tomlinson as they separate fact from fallacy.

programme.title: MonsterQuest
programme.desc: In different parts of the world there are eyewitnesses who claim they saw various mythical, strange and even scary creatures, from vampires and ghosts to different types of monsters. These individuals tell their stories while a team of experts and scientists use any available evidence to try to find explanations for these unusual sightings.

programme.title: The Universe
programme.desc: Every day, new information is discovered that helps us better understand how our Universe works. Some of this evidence solves mysteries dating back thousands of years. Some evidence offers new theories on how human civilization came into existence. In this season of The Universe: Ancient Mysteries Solved, well tackle mysteries such as an American Stonehenge built 500 years before Columbus, and how the Aztec Pyramids helped seal the downfall of the Mayan and Aztec empires. Well also look at some of the Roman Empires most iconic structures, and their connection to archeo-astronomy.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: ANCIENT ALIENS examines 75 million years of the most credible alien evidence here on Earth, from the age of the dinosaurs, to ancient Egypt, to the skies over the western desert in the present day US. Ancient cave drawings of strange creatures, an asphalt-like substance in an Egyptian pyramid made from the remains of unidentified creatures, continued mass sightings in the USA -- these are just a few of the strange stories that will be investigated.

programme.title: The Tesla Files
programme.desc: Documentary series that investigates mysteries surrounding the work of inventor Nikola Tesla, one of the most important and eccentric scientists in history. In the late 19th and early 20th century, Nikola Tesla invented alternating current, developed radio and cell phone technology, conceived of wireless electricity, remote control and electric cars, and devised a mega-weapon more deadly than the atomic bomb. Researcher Marc Seifer, astrophysicist Travis Taylor, and investigative journalist Jason Stapleton try to unravel the mystery of Teslas missing files, which were confiscated by the US government after he died in 1943. Did they contain his plans for free worldwide electricity? Or his designs for a death ray? Tune in and find out!

programme.title: Serial Killer Earth
programme.desc: Gripping and unsettling documentary series that features a team of experts who in each episode examine various footage from news and home video, as well as eyewitness testimony, in order to explain, understand and inform viewers of what actually happened during some of the most devastating natural disasters- including Hurricane Katrina, the earthquake and tsunami that devastated Japan, a monstrous earthquake in Haiti, avalanche of rocks and debris that destroyed a village in Honduras, and many other hurricanes, earthquakes, tsunamis, floodings, droughts and devastating forest fires. programme.title: Lost Worlds
programme.desc: Documentary series that brings back to life lost cities, structures, cultures, and civilisations, transporting viewers back in time and revealing the truth behind some of historys most iconic eras. Using a combination of cutting-edge technology and archaeological research, the team detail what life was like for these places during their peak of their powers, and use visual overlays to compare past and present landscapes. From the Knights Templar to the lost city of Atlantis, ancient Egypt to Hitlers planned supercity, and ancient Athens to Americas wild west, each episodes dives into these extraordinary remnants of human history.

programme.title: Life After People
programme.desc: This unique documentary series explores what the planet would look like if all human life diappeared. With comment and opinion coming from scientists, engineers and other experts, this show speculates on how a lack of human intervention would impact on the environment and the other animal species. The show does not provide any explanation as to why humans have vanished from the face of the Earth but does surmise that human infrastructure is still present along with pets and domesticated livestock. Each episode explores what would happen to specific structures such as skyscrapers, bridges and dams or details the impact on human remains, artefacts and other objects. Some real-life abandoned locations are discussed and the show also uses CGI dramatisations to depict how the situation would look after one day, one week, one year, 10 years, 15 years, 25 years, 50 years, 100 years, 200 years, etc.

programme.title: Digging for the Truth

programme.title: The Curse of Civil War Gold
programme.desc: Treasure hunters Rick and Marty Lagina, the stars of Historys "The Curse of Oak Island," learn of a new mystery that may even rival Oak Islands. Michigan native Kevin Dykstra is obsessed with a deathbed confession made by a lighthouse keeper in the 1890s about a national treasure dating back to the Civil War. The story goes that Union soldiers tracked down Confederate president Jefferson Davis in 1865 and confiscated his gold. The stolen loot was smuggled north some years later but ended up in Lake Michigan, where Dykstra believes it still remains. His quest to prove it ultimately takes him and his team to the bottom of Lake Michigan.

programme.title: Lost Worlds
programme.desc: Documentary series that brings back to life lost cities, structures, cultures, and civilisations, transporting viewers back in time and revealing the truth behind some of historys most iconic eras. From the Knights Templar to the lost city of Atlantis, ancient Egypt to Hitlers planned supercity, and ancient Athens to Americas wild west, each episodes dives into these extraordinary remnants of human history.

programme.title: Life After People
programme.desc: This unique documentary series explores what the planet would look like if all human life diappeared. With comment and opinion coming from scientists, engineers and other experts, this show speculates on how a lack of human intervention would impact on the environment and the other animal species. The show does not provide any explanation as to why humans have vanished from the face of the Earth but does surmise that human infrastructure is still present along with pets and domesticated livestock. Each episode explores what would happen to specific structures such as skyscrapers, bridges and dams or details the impact on human remains, artefacts and other objects. Some real-life abandoned locations are discussed and the show also uses CGI dramatisations to depict how the situation would look after one day, one week, one year, 10 years, 15 years, 25 years, 50 years, 100 years, 200 years, etc.

programme.desc: With the help of expert geologists and various scientists, How the Earth Was Made is a remarkable documentary series that examines the powerful forces and events that have shaped our planet. Each episode focusses on a different location to explore how it has adapted and adjusted over millions of years, such as the Grand Canyon, Mount Everest, the Sahara desert and the Mariana Trench.

programme.title: Ross Kemp: Deep Sea Treasure Hunter
programme.desc: In a brand-new Sky HISTORY show, Ross Kemp dives on a series of incredible shipwrecks around the British coastline to reveal some of the nations murkiest and best-kept secrets. From the remains of a slave ship discovered off Plymouth, to the Kaisers sunken Imperial Fleet in Scapa Flow and an experimental submarine aircraft carrier, which sank with all passengers and crew on deck during its sea trials, Ross uncovers Britains hidden maritime past.

programme.title: The Tesla Files
programme.desc: Documentary series that investigates mysteries surrounding the work of inventor Nikola Tesla, one of the most important and eccentric scientists in history. In the late 19th and early 20th century, Nikola Tesla invented alternating current, developed radio and cell phone technology, conceived of wireless electricity, remote control and electric cars, and devised a mega-weapon more deadly than the atomic bomb. Researcher Marc Seifer, astrophysicist Travis Taylor, and investigative journalist Jason Stapleton try to unravel the mystery of Teslas missing files, which were confiscated by the US government after he died in 1943. Did they contain his plans for free worldwide electricity? Or his designs for a death ray? Tune in and find out!

programme.title: The Murder Tapes
programme.desc: Crime documentary series that examines homicide investigations using unfiltered footage, including body-cam, surveillance and interrogation-room footage, giving viewers a chance to follow a case from beginning to end. The series will give viewers a chance to experience how homicide cases are conducted, from the initial crime scene investigations by body cam, to home security tapes, to interrogation room footage of real confessions. Real tapes of the investigations will be combined with interviews with friends, family members, and law enforcement directly involved in the case.

programme.title: Two Shallow Graves
programme.desc: Merritts phone pings near the desert graves. Prosecutors suggest he tried to delete financial records to cover his tracks. A lawyer suddenly leaves the trial.

programme.title: Murder Calls
programme.desc: Murder Calls is a true-crime documentary series that explores the importance of the 911 calls made to the emergency services. Each episode features the chilling calls themselves, as detectives and investigators use the given information to help them track, trace and identify the potential killers. Using extensive reenactments, Murder Calls recreates aspects of the haunting murders, showing the twists and turns detectives face as they aim to understand the motive and identify the culprits. As with many murder cases, nothing at first is what it seems.

programme.title: American Monster
programme.desc: If you looked into the eyes of a killer, would you know? In American Monster, you find out. For the first time, viewers get closer than ever to some of Americas most shocking and surprising crimes. Filled with never-before-seen footage of these devils in disguise, from home movie shots of them playing with their kids to musical performances at high school, from the church cook-out to the wedding video, American Monster interweaves twisting-turning stories of astonishing crimes, with behind-the-scenes footage of killers at their seemingly most innocent.

programme.title: Murder By Numbers
programme.desc: Murder by Numbers is a true-crime documentary series exploring disturbing cases of deranged killers across the USA. Using extensive reenactments, the brutal crimes are brought to life, to show viewers the appearance of crime scenes and the issues faced by detectives. After bodies are found, vigorous investigations begin, with law enforcement officials scrambling to unearth evidence and identify the culprit. What they find leaves more than a sour taste, as distressing discoveries of a second corpse leaves officials stunned and disturbed. Now the investigation takes a far more sinister and eerie turn.

programme.title: Undercover Underage
programme.desc: Every day, countless adults utilize the internet with insidious intentions to groom, sexually exploit, and abuse children online. Committed to helping law enforcement stop these perpetrators, child advocate Roo Powell and the team at her nonprofit organization SOSA (Safe from Online Sex Abuse) work in collaboration with law enforcement to detect and identify the menacing adults who use the internet to harm children. Undercover Underage follows Roo as the 38-year-old mother of three transforms her appearance into a teen online. Once adults engage with Roos underage decoys, its a race against the clock to gather enough information to positively identify the offenders and get them on law enforcements radar.

programme.title: People Magazine Investigates
programme.desc: Investigation Discovery and People magazine partner to re-examine some of the most high profile crime cases in recent history. The one-hour series brings viewers tales of betrayal, buried secrets and unsung heroes, ripped from the pages of one of the nations top weekly magazines. These stories transcended news and became part of pop culture, revealing shocking twists, new evidence, and unexpected resolutions. Interlaced within every episode are exclusive interviews with Peoples journalists, archival footage, re-creations, and firsthand accounts by those closest to the investigations.

programme.title: Breaking Homicide
programme.desc: The most tragic crimes are the ones that never reached a conclusion, lives have been lost and no one ever held accountable as the case eventually goes cold. What happens when years pass by with no justice? Police Detective Derrick Levasseur and Forensic Psychologist Kris Mohandiewill are on a mission to reopen cases and find answers for the victims and loved ones who need to finally feel peace. Theyll be looking into cases such as Michelle OKeefe and Devan Schmidt murders, re-examining old clues and sourcing new ones, will they be able to find details that have previously been missed?

programme.title: Home Sweet Homicide
programme.desc: Home. Its the place where we feel safe, secure, loved and at peace. But not all homes are so lucky. No matter how many locks, bolts, alarms and cameras we install, if someone wants to get in, theyll find a way. This true-crime documentary series reveals murders committed inside peoples homes, showing how twisted individuals invaded the private sanctuaries of American citizens to brutally slay them in their humble abode. Detectives share their experiences from working on these cases, dissecting their abnormalities and presenting the peculiar pieces of evidence that baffled them as they attempted to identify the culprit.

programme.title: Hometown Homicide
programme.desc: Hometown Homicide is a documentary crime series dedicated to investigations of cold blooded murders in small towns and communities. The investigators are looking for the killer in a place where everybody knows everybody but keeps silent. This series makes us realize that small communities can hide dark secrets and the killer can live just next door. Sometimes its hard to believe that the stories are based on facts.

programme.title: I am Homicide
programme.desc: Thrilling docu-crime series that revisits some of the most compelling cases former Charlotte Detective Garry McFadden, known simply as Homicide, has solved in his 35 year long career. Charismatic and intelligent, he used his street smarts to work the neighborhoods, gather critical information and solve over 800 cases, putting himself in dangerous situations on a daily basis. Detective McFadden often knew those involved- the victims, the family members and sometimes even the culprits. The series features his incredible stories, dramatic reenactments and present-day interviews with family members of victims.

programme.desc: Thrilling docu-crime series that revisits some of the most compelling cases former Charlotte Detective Garry McFadden, known simply as Homicide, has solved in his 35 year long career. Charismatic and intelligent, he used his street smarts to work the neighborhoods, gather critical information and solve over 800 cases, putting himself in dangerous situations on a daily basis. Detective McFadden often knew those involved- the victims, the family members and sometimes even the culprits. The series features his incredible stories, dramatic reenactments and present-day interviews with family members of victims.

programme.title: Homicide City
programme.desc: In this true-crime documentary series we profile the unforgettable murders committed on the streets of Philadelphia. Home to 1.5 million people, Pennsylvanias largest city has one of the highest murder rates in the United States. We speak with a variety of people who remember these cases, from veteran homicide detectives to local reporters, and listen to the excruciating stories from victims families, who forever bear the burden of a murdered loved one. In unprecedented detail, we reveal the motives and culprits behind these tragic killings. These are the cases that shook a city, leaving a lasting imprint on all those involved.

programme.title: Homicide City
programme.desc: In this true-crime documentary series we profile the unforgettable murders committed on the streets of Philadelphia. Home to 1.5 million people, Pennsylvanias largest city has one of the highest murder rates in the United States. We speak with a variety of people who remember these cases, from veteran homicide detectives to local reporters, and listen to the excruciating stories from victims families, who forever bear the burden of a murdered loved one. In unprecedented detail, we reveal the motives and culprits behind these tragic killings. These are the cases that shook a city, leaving a lasting imprint on all those involved.

programme.title: Murder By Numbers
programme.desc: Murder by Numbers is a true-crime documentary series exploring disturbing cases of deranged killers across the USA. Using extensive reenactments, the brutal crimes are brought to life, to show viewers the appearance of crime scenes and the issues faced by detectives. After bodies are found, vigorous investigations begin, with law enforcement officials scrambling to unearth evidence and identify the culprit. What they find leaves more than a sour taste, as distressing discoveries of a second corpse leaves officials stunned and disturbed. Now the investigation takes a far more sinister and eerie turn.

programme.title: On the Case with Paula Zahn
programme.desc: Documentary series presented by the journalist Paula Zahn. Speaking to people connected with real-life crimes and looking at actions surrounding these shocking events, Zahn aims to uncover the truth behind true crime cases.

programme.title: American Monster
programme.desc: If you looked into the eyes of a killer, would you know? In American Monster, you find out. For the first time, viewers get closer than ever to some of Americas most shocking and surprising crimes. Filled with never-before-seen footage of these devils in disguise, from home movie shots of them playing with their kids to musical performances at high school, from the church cook-out to the wedding video, American Monster interweaves twisting-turning stories of astonishing crimes, with behind-the-scenes footage of killers at their seemingly most innocent.

programme.title: The Murder Tapes
programme.desc: Crime documentary series that examines homicide investigations using unfiltered footage, including body-cam, surveillance and interrogation-room footage, giving viewers a chance to follow a case from beginning to end. The series will give viewers a chance to experience how homicide cases are conducted, from the initial crime scene investigations by body cam, to home security tapes, to interrogation room footage of real confessions. Real tapes of the investigations will be combined with interviews with friends, family members, and law enforcement directly involved in the case.

programme.title: Cabin In the Woods
programme.desc: When a cosmetology student goes missing from Dubuque, Iowa, detectives question if her disappearance connects to another murder.

programme.title: On the Case with Paula Zahn
programme.desc: Documentary series presented by the journalist Paula Zahn. Speaking to people connected with real-life crimes and looking at actions surrounding these shocking events, Zahn aims to uncover the truth behind true crime cases.

programme.title: Breaking Homicide
programme.desc: The most tragic crimes are the ones that never reached a conclusion, lives have been lost and no one ever held accountable as the case eventually goes cold. What happens when years pass by with no justice? Police Detective Derrick Levasseur and Forensic Psychologist Kris Mohandiewill are on a mission to reopen cases and find answers for the victims and loved ones who need to finally feel peace. Theyll be looking into cases such as Michelle OKeefe and Devan Schmidt murders, re-examining old clues and sourcing new ones, will they be able to find details that have previously been missed?

programme.title: Home Sweet Homicide
programme.desc: Home. Its the place where we feel safe, secure, loved and at peace. But not all homes are so lucky. No matter how many locks, bolts, alarms and cameras we install, if someone wants to get in, theyll find a way. This true-crime documentary series reveals murders committed inside peoples homes, showing how twisted individuals invaded the private sanctuaries of American citizens to brutally slay them in their humble abode. Detectives share their experiences from working on these cases, dissecting their abnormalities and presenting the peculiar pieces of evidence that baffled them as they attempted to identify the culprit.

programme.title: Hometown Homicide
programme.desc: Hometown Homicide is a documentary crime series dedicated to investigations of cold blooded murders in small towns and communities. The investigators are looking for the killer in a place where everybody knows everybody but keeps silent. This series makes us realize that small communities can hide dark secrets and the killer can live just next door. Sometimes its hard to believe that the stories are based on facts.

programme.title: I am Homicide

programme.title: Devil Among Us
programme.desc: A brutal attack seems isolated, but investigators soon discover its only the tip of an iceberg. Acts of revenge, serial killings and twisted webs of deceit leave communities in fear as revelations stack up to reveal these real-life devils in disguise.

programme.title: Evil Stepmothers
programme.desc: True crime series. When parents separate or divorce it is always tough for the children. So when a father finds a new partner and welcomes her to the family, how can you be sure if she is as amiable as first appearances suggest? These harrowing real stories, along with re-enactments, reveal how step-mothers can change from friendly parental figures, to abusive and even murderous family members. Featuring tales from across the United States, these brutal and vicious women make Cinerallas stepmother look like a saint, and truly support the old saying: you cant judge a book by its cover.

programme.title: Evil Twins
programme.desc: In this true-crime documentary series we reveal heinous acts committed by evil twins. A well-studied, natural phenomenon, many people believe twins have a unique bond that is unexplainable by science. These intriguing siblings share a womb, identical DNA and, in many cases, similar personalities. We explore the chilling crimes these maniacal twins have committed, occasionally against each other. Each episode focusses on a different crime and tries to understand the motive behind the madness. Murder cases, thefts, city-running gangsters; we explore copious different cases that have involved twin siblings.

programme.title: Evil Lives Here: The Killer Speaks
programme.desc: During the day Lorenzo Gilyard is a well-liked professional. At night hes a monster, preying on the women who work the streets.

programme.title: Evil Talks: Chilling Confessions
programme.desc: A true crime series that takes a unique view at an often overlooked part of criminal investigations - the confession. Covering crimes from home invasions to murder, this show examines all aspects of crime and highlights the skillful tactics used by law enforcement interrogation experts. Splicing dramatic simulations with actual police footage, each epsiode focuses on a different case and we are exposed to the often chilling verbatim accounts of the perpetrators as they are interviewed by the investigating officers. One such case involves two apparent strangers who are found dead in two separate states but who display the same MO. The detectives, from different jurisdictions, have to uncover the link between the two men, why they were killed and who the murderer is.

programme.title: Gone
programme.desc: True crime series exploring the unexpected disappearances of people in the USA and the difficulty the police have with solving the mysteries. After members of the community vanish without a trace, law enforcement officials are tasked with tracking them down before they become a victim. These detectives, along with determined loved ones, spend years agonizing over minute details that could help them understand what led to the disappearance of seemingly untroubled people. With some cases taking decades to solve, Gone looks at the impact this has on friends and family members seeking closure.

programme.title: Gone

programme.title: Mother, May I Murder?
programme.desc: After the murder of an army major, police uncover a twisted world of swinging, manipulation, and a teen trapped in a familys dark double life.

programme.title: The West Memphis Three: An ID Murder Mystery
programme.desc: In 1993, police discover three young boys murdered and mutilated in West Memphis, Arkansas. Investigators believe the crime was committed by Satanists.

programme.title: Лицом к событию
programme.desc: Лидер в той или иной сфере общественной жизни - человек известный и информированный - под перекрестным огнем вопросов ведущих программы Михаила Соколова и Елены Рыковцевой.

programme.title: Мамаша
programme.desc: Рассказ о жизни Кристи Планкетт, одинокой матери, которая преодолела свою зависимость от алкоголя и наркотиков и пытается начать жизнь заново в городе Напа, Калифорния, который является центром американского виноделия. Она работает официанткой в ресторане и посещает встречи анонимных алкоголиков. Её мать Бонни Планкетт, также как и дочь, справилась с зависимостью от алкоголя и наркотиков и хочет наладить отношения с дочерью. Семнадцатилетняя дочь Вайолет, родившаяся, когда Кристи было всего 16 лет, ждет ребёнка от своего приятеля Люка. У Кристи также есть второй ребёнок - Роско, от бывшего парня по имени Бакстер. У Бакстера нет работы, он не платит алименты Кристи, а его планы о заработке денег связаны с продажей наркотиков.

programme.title: Мамаша
programme.desc: Рассказ о жизни Кристи Планкетт, одинокой матери, которая преодолела свою зависимость от алкоголя и наркотиков и пытается начать жизнь заново в городе Напа, Калифорния, который является центром американского виноделия. programme.title: Первые ласточки
programme.desc: Катя вынуждена нарушить молчание и рассказать про послания Полины следователю. Дэн тоже решает раскрыть тайну: об ориентации Феди узнаёт весь класс. После аварии Лера впадает в кому и становится главным подозреваемым. На неё указывают все улики, в том числе содержимое её компьютера. Но Ольгу Макарову мучают сомнения.

programme.title: Ловушка
programme.desc: Главе самого мощного городского мафиозного клана удалось прекратить криминальные войны. Казалось бы, он наконец-то может уйти на покой, передав дела своим молодым и дерзким помощникам. Но те слишком рьяно берутся за дело: быстро удваивают доходы, но своими жесткими методами вызывают волну всеобщего недовольства. Мечта крестного отца о тихой жизни никак не осуществится - ему постоянно приходится вмешиваться, чтобы сохранить мир. Однако о мире приходится забыть, когда после 12-ти лет тюрьмы в город возвращается крупный криминальный авторитет, готовый любой ценой вернуть утраченные позиции.

programme.title: Утро
programme.desc: Утренняя новостная программа Настоящего времени.

programme.title: Ждём в гости
programme.desc: Проект Ирины Хангошвили о культуре, истории и традициях различных стран мира. Ведущий - Зураб Двали - путешествует и приглашает зрителей пройтись вместе с ним по красивым местам, увидеть достопримечательности, полюбоваться природой и познакомиться с интересными людьми. Всюду гостеприимные хозяева говорят нашим телезрителям: "Ждем в гости!" Зрители сначала узнают интересные исторические факты о самых известных или забытых регионах различных стран, и затем останавливаются на кулинарных традициях - готовят несколько блюд с гостями программы.

programme.title: Все любят Рэймонда
programme.desc: "Все любят Рэймонда" – это американская ситком-комедия, повествующая о повседневной жизни Рэймонда Барона, спортивного обозревателя, проживающего с семьёй на Лонг-Айленде. Основная изюминка сериала – остроумный характер комедии, где на первый план выходят семейные отношения: с любящей, но часто критичной женой, Деброй, детьми, а также с навязчивыми родителями и завистливым братом, которые живут через дорогу. Сериал идеально подойдёт для тех, кто хочет смотреть лёгкие и забавные истории о семейной жизни. Серию за серией, комедийные ситуации создают атмосферу доброты и юмора.

programme.title: Все любят Рэймонда
programme.desc: "Все любят Рэймонда" – это американская ситком-комедия, повествующая о повседневной жизни Рэймонда Барона, спортивного обозревателя, проживающего с семьёй на Лонг-Айленде. programme.title: Тёща-командир
programme.desc: "Катвас" - так за глаза сотрудники агентства недвижимости называют свою грозную начальницу Катерину Васильевну Тихонову, которая никому не дает спуску, в особенности - своему зятю Юрию. Катерина считает, что Юра недостоин ее дочки Гали, и делает все для того, чтобы их развести. Увлеченная работой и семейными проблемами, Катерина даже не замечает, что в нее влюблен ее личный шофер Максим. Но гордость и предубеждение управляют ее чувствами и здесь. Чтобы найти свое счастье и окончательно не разрушить счастье дочери, Катерине придется наступить на горло собственным принципам.

programme.title: Всем ветрам назло
programme.desc: Алисе Лапиковой семнадцать лет. У нее вполне обеспеченная жизнь: богатый отец, хороший дом, куча денег на карманные расходы. На этом все хорошее в жизни Алисы и заканчивается. У нее отвратительные отношения с мачехой Еленой и ее дочерью от первого брака Лидой. И все винят в этом Алису. Даже родной отец. Елена сначала обвиняет Алису в воровстве — якобы та украла дорогое ожерелье, а потом утверждает, что Алиса хочет отравить ее, и предъявляет доказательства, которым верит и отец. Влюбленный в Елену Лапиков объявляет Алисе, что он больше не хочет даже слышать о ней. Теперь Алиса будет жить с матерью. Алисе всю жизнь говорили, что ее мать умерла, но недавно она узнала, что мать официально отказалась от нее, когда Алисе было два года.

programme.desc: Алисе Лапиковой семнадцать лет. У нее вполне обеспеченная жизнь: богатый отец, хороший дом, куча денег на карманные расходы. На этом все хорошее в жизни Алисы и заканчивается. У нее отвратительные отношения с мачехой Еленой и ее дочерью от первого брака Лидой. И все винят в этом Алису. Даже родной отец. Елена сначала обвиняет Алису в воровстве — якобы та украла дорогое ожерелье, а потом утверждает, что Алиса хочет отравить ее, и предъявляет доказательства, которым верит и отец. Влюбленный в Елену Лапиков объявляет Алисе, что он больше не хочет даже слышать о ней. Теперь Алиса будет жить с матерью. Алисе всю жизнь говорили, что ее мать умерла, но недавно она узнала, что мать официально отказалась от нее, когда Алисе было два года.

programme.title: Всем ветрам назло
programme.desc: Алисе Лапиковой семнадцать лет. У нее вполне обеспеченная жизнь: богатый отец, хороший дом, куча денег на карманные расходы. На этом все хорошее в жизни Алисы и заканчивается. programme.title: Орёл и Решка. Земляне
programme.desc: Michelle Andrade и Кирилл Макашов отправились в Грузию, чтобы познакомиться с самыми гостеприимными землянами во всем мире. Для грузина гость - настоящий подарок. Они охотно помогут, накормят, напоят и приютят на ночлег любого путешественника. Кирилл Макашов будет шиковать с золотой картой в кармане и увидит, где живут и как отдыхают самые богатые грузины. А Michelle Andrade поднимется по "дороге смерти" в самый высокогорный район в Грузии Тушети и познакомится с единственными землянами во всей Европе, которые живут так высоко в горах....

programme.title: Главное
programme.desc: Ежедневная информационная программа Настоящего времени.

programme.title: Анатомия убийства
programme.desc: Студент Медицинского университета Андрей Каравайчук арестован по подозрению в убийстве отца. Улики и свидетели - всё против Андрея. За него только отчим, который готов поклясться, что парень из дома не выходил, и обрывок нити из шелка и кашемира, найденный Евгенией. Но сколько можно удержать на этой короткой нитке? Особенно, когда все члены странной семейки лгут, и ни у кого нет алиби - кроме главного подозреваемого.

programme.title: 5 минут тишины. Новые горизонты
programme.desc: Спасатели отряда 42-21 получают временное назначение в Ульяновск. Свадьба Лины и Грека снова срывается, а Шимко с удочеренной девочкой решает переехать в Анапу. Гиреев обещает попросить перевод, чтобы воссоединиться с семьей. Но героям некогда решать личные проблемы: прямо перед отъездом им приходится спасать дайвера, который нашел клад в затопленной старой усадьбе на дне реки и застрял под упавшей плитой…

programme.title: Первые ласточки
programme.desc: С момента аварии проходит 9 месяцев. Пока в школе готовятся к выпускному, Лера приходит в себя и понимает, что Друг — это Дэн. Следователь Макарова снова не может быть рядом с сыном — её вызывают на место убийства. Катя, Ник и Федя приходят на вручение аттестатов и попадают в ловушку.

programme.title: Лицом к событию
programme.desc: Лидер в той или иной сфере общественной жизни - человек известный и информированный - под перекрестным огнем вопросов ведущих программы Михаила Соколова и Елены Рыковцевой.

programme.title: Мамаша
programme.desc: Рассказ о жизни Кристи Планкетт, одинокой матери, которая преодолела свою зависимость от алкоголя и наркотиков и пытается начать жизнь заново в городе Напа, Калифорния, который является центром американского виноделия. Она работает официанткой в ресторане и посещает встречи анонимных алкоголиков. Её мать Бонни Планкетт, также как и дочь, справилась с зависимостью от алкоголя и наркотиков и хочет наладить отношения с дочерью. Семнадцатилетняя дочь Вайолет, родившаяся, когда Кристи было всего 16 лет, ждет ребёнка от своего приятеля Люка. У Кристи также есть второй ребёнок - Роско, от бывшего парня по имени Бакстер. У Бакстера нет работы, он не платит алименты Кристи, а его планы о заработке денег связаны с продажей наркотиков.

programme.title: Мамаша
programme.desc: Рассказ о жизни Кристи Планкетт, одинокой матери, которая преодолела свою зависимость от алкоголя и наркотиков и пытается начать жизнь заново в городе Напа, Калифорния, который является центром американского виноделия.
