programme.title: Pole to Pole with Will Smith
programme.desc: Will struggles in bone-chilling winds in the South Pole, where temperatures can drop below -100°F. He skis, treks and climbs across giant icefields and cliffs with the support of one of the worlds best polar athletes, Richard Parks. In one of the planets most isolated research stations, scientists take ice cores deep under the surface and make incredible sacrifices to pursue their research.

programme.title: Pole to Pole with Will Smith
programme.desc: Will, A MAN SCARED OF SPIDERS HIS WHOLE LIFE, ventures deep into the Ecuadorian Amazon in search of deadly creatures. Joined by professor Bryan Fry and local mountaineer Carla Perez, they abseil 200 feet into a cave network known as the "womb of the Earth," to discover the giant tarantula. Using cutting-edge techniques, they extract its venom, which could hold the key to saving millions of lives.

programme.title: UFOs: Investigating the Unknown
programme.desc: For more than five decades the US government has refused to discuss UFOs, but now, Navy pilots tell of seeing mysterious objects tracking their fighter jets - vehicles unlike anything theyve ever seen before; top-secret Naval videos are leaked that captivate the world. Government officials, led by former U.S. Senator Harry Reid, demand an investigation. At long last, it looks like the truth about UFOs may finally be revealed.

programme.title: UFOs: Investigating the Unknown
programme.desc: In 2008 in Stephenville, Texas a local pilot sees lights in the sky over his ranch coming from something huge. He is not alone: hundreds of people saw the craft, and a local reporter makes it her lifes work to tell their stories. From this classic encounter we head back several decades to the beginning of the UFO phenomenon in America and the launch of Project Blue Book to study the countrys growing "UFO problem."

programme.title: UFO Europe: Untold Stories
programme.desc: Scotlands Livingston UFO, Norways Hessdalen Lights and Portugals Castelo de Bode Dam encounter. On 17th June, 1977 a young Portuguese pilot comes face to face with a large unknown object at 5,000 feet. He observes it for a few seconds before it vanishes into the clouds. Suddenly, his magnetic compass spins wildly and his aircraft goes into an uncontrolled nose dive. In the early 1980s hundreds of mysterious lights are witnessed flying through the Hessdalen Valley in Norway. Scientist Erling Strand from Ostfold University College is keen to investigate so he sets up camp in the valley. He is amazed at the spectacular lights and after capturing them on film, discovers something intriguing. In 1979 a Scottish forester describes an incredible encounter with a UFO in a lonely clearing. He falls down unconscious and when he comes to, finds cuts on his legs and tears on his trousers. The police launch the UKs first ever criminal investigation into a UFO encounter.

programme.title: To Catch a Smuggler
programme.desc: Even during a pandemic, smuggling never stops. After adjusting tactics in the early days of the COVID crisis to meet the increasing flow of narcotics coming across our southern land borders, the Department of Homeland Security is now pivoting back to our nations airports where international travel is starting to rev back up again. Whether narco-traffickers try to slip through an airport, seaport or land crossing, vigilant officers are on high-alert to stem the flow of illegal contraband. Using every tool available to them, DHS will stop at nothing to catch a smuggler.

programme.title: To Catch a Smuggler
programme.desc: Even during a pandemic, smuggling never stops. After adjusting tactics in the early days of the COVID crisis to meet the increasing flow of narcotics coming across our southern land borders, the Department of Homeland Security is now pivoting back to our nations airports where international travel is starting to rev back up again. Whether narco-traffickers try to slip through an airport, seaport or land crossing, vigilant officers are on high-alert to stem the flow of illegal contraband. Using every tool available to them, DHS will stop at nothing to catch a smuggler.

programme.title: Drain the Oceans
programme.desc: Using the latest sonar technology, a unique expedition to map sunken Allied vessels off the Normandy Coast reveals stunning images from beneath the waves. There are over a hundred shipwrecks in the English Channel of the landing craft and ships that took part in the greatest amphibious Invasion Fleet ever assembled. As the water drains away, we reveal extraordinary, secret technology deployed by both the Allies and the Nazis in the battle for western Europe. The outcome of that conflict changes our world forever.

programme.title: Drain the Oceans
programme.desc: Extreme weather patterns have threatened ships and mariners for centuries. The perfect storm?. towering walls of water, powerful winds and churning seas can overwhelm any ship. What brought down the largest haul of Spanish treasure off the coast of Florida? And whats the truth behind the strange disappearance of the mightiest invasion force of ancient times? Drain the Oceans reveals the secrets of Stormy Seas.

programme.title: Air Crash Investigation
programme.desc: December 29, 1972. Eastern Airlines Flight 401 is coming in for a landing in Miami. On the crews instrument panel, one of the three green lights confirming the planes landing gear is down and locked remains unlit. Captain Robert Loft decides to have the auto pilot fly the plane in a holding pattern while he and his crew work to fix the problem. Flying at 2,000 feet all four men in the cockpit focus their attention on the troublesome bulb. None of them notice that the plane is slowly descending to the ground, until its too late. The brand new L-1011 slams into the remote swampland of the Florida Everglades. Miraculously 77 people survive the initial crash. Investigators determine that the plane was mechanically sound, and that its auto pilot was working. So why had the state of the art jetliner fallen from the sky? The clues would lead investigators to a very troubling cause.

programme.title: Air Crash Investigation
programme.desc: Radio silence between pilots and air traffic controllers can mean many different things, but only the physical evidence can reveal the true story. Three shocking cases send investigators hunting for answers. A Greek airliner goes rogue and crashes outside Athens. A China Airlines 747 disappears from radar and the culprit is discovered on the ocean floor. And, when controllers lose contact with a private jet, fighter planes scramble to intervene.

programme.title: Africas Hunters
programme.desc: Large carnivores such as leopards, lions and hyenas are in constant competition for their next meal for their pack in Zambias Luangwa Valley. Following the lives of the wise old leopard Kamuti who rained over the prime territory in the Luangwa Valley for 10 years, a six-week-old lion cub and a clan of spotted hyenas, this documentary series allows audiences to see these magnificent animals like never before. With up-close imagery of animals existing within Luangwa Valley and their life in the wild, feel a part of the pack with Africas Hunters.

programme.title: Worlds Deadliest
programme.desc: Our world is home to an array of wild creatures…creatures that have evolved to survive amid harsh environments, and brutal competition. But in every region resides an elite group of twelve species -- an assembly of mammals, reptiles, insects, and arachnids-- equipped with an arsenal of predatory and defensive skills. Theyre beautiful, theyre highly evolved, and theyre dangerous-they are the Deadly Dozen.

programme.title: Killer Safari
programme.desc: Big Cats V Prey. From elephants charging with lions clinging to their tusks, to turf wars between male leopards and hyenas driving a lion off his own buffalo kill, this epic safari reveals raw nature at its fiercest.

programme.title: Killer Safari
programme.desc: A cheetah disappears underwater in seconds; a crocodile faces down ten lions; a buffalo plays tug-of-war with a crocodiles nose - and loses. Theres no doubt that crocodiles rule Africas waterways where invisibility and stealth are their secret weapons. This safari gives you a front row seat to witness the explosive action of every surprise encounter.

programme.title: Killer Safari
programme.desc: When the Savannah turns into a battleground, its hard to choose a hero. Who will win when its tooth versus claw?

programme.title: Worlds Deadliest Animals

programme.title: The Incredible Pol Farm
programme.desc: Are Ewe Pregnant?. The Pols are preparing for sheep to give birth, which means figuring out how to catch and shear their four Merino ewes - no small task as this is new territory for everyone except Dr. Pol.

programme.title: Killer Safari
programme.desc: Big Cats V Prey. From elephants charging with lions clinging to their tusks, to turf wars between male leopards and hyenas driving a lion off his own buffalo kill, this epic safari reveals raw nature at its fiercest.

programme.title: Deadly Instincts
programme.desc: For any animal, growing up is tough. Young life is riddled with seminal moments and momentous mistakes. A baby elephant gets kicked around by males from her family, and discovered the perils associated with keeping up with the herd when your mum is inexpe

programme.title: Trials of the Wild
programme.desc: Watch a range of wild animals trying to survive in the wilderness as they migrate, hunt and defend themselves against predators and the dangers that are living alongside them. Follow animals born to fight to those designed to live in the canopy of trees as the series gives you an insight into natures greatest spectacles from around the world on land, water and air. This nature documentary is intriguing and engaging as they examine a range of species and how they survive in the most brutal environments.

programme.title: Prairie Dog Manor
programme.desc: Follow the exploits of these cute creatures from northern New Mexico. "Prairie Dog Manor" showcases the unique behaviour of these special animals and highlights the different relationships that exist between the clan members from Valles Caldera National Preserve. Beginning with the prairie dogs preparing for the coming winter, Carl and the pups get ready for hibernation. But they face danger from an unlikely source as deadly predators forge an alliance to threaten every dog in the territory. Further episodes explore the mating season when the warm weather arrives and battles commence between the males to earn the right to mate with the females. Soon, the females are pregnant and new pups arrive and the whole cycle starts again.

programme.title: Prairie Dog Manor
programme.desc: Follow the exploits of these cute creatures from northern New Mexico. "Prairie Dog Manor" showcases the unique behaviour of these special animals and highlights the different relationships that exist between the clan members from Valles Caldera National Preserve. Beginning with the prairie dogs preparing for the coming winter, Carl and the pups get ready for hibernation. But they face danger from an unlikely source as deadly predators forge an alliance to threaten every dog in the territory. Further episodes explore the mating season when the warm weather arrives and battles commence between the males to earn the right to mate with the females. Soon, the females are pregnant and new pups arrive and the whole cycle starts again.

programme.title: Underdogs
programme.desc: Ryan Reynolds puts the spotlight on the underdogs who get ahead by dishonest means. From the master-of-disguise frogfish to a butt-biting jackal and a multiheaded caterpillar playing the decoy, they are the masters of deception and deceit. And bringing all these hustlers together is the greatest con artist of them all - a cunning macaque who feeds on the spoils from unsuspecting tourists.

programme.title: Deadly Instincts
programme.desc: Life in the wilderness is tough, so different creatures from the animal kingdom have different strategies for surviving. This is an exploration of those primal instincts, which are not always as obvious as it seems. We look into unique ways in which various animals parent their young, mate, fight and kill in order to prolong their species.

programme.title: Underdogs
programme.desc: Ryan shares his distinct take on the underdogs using gross-out tactics to win the game of life. With manatees using flatulence to control their buoyancy to cave-dwelling fungus gnats creating beautifully illuminated flytraps with mucus from their butts, these underdogs are out to prove who may be the grossest survivor of them all.

programme.title: Deadly Instincts
programme.desc: Primal Urges. In the animal world, mating is big business. Its key to passing on genes, and ultimately species survival. These are the stories of dedication, intimacy and ruthlessness that make up the game of love.

programme.title: Underdogs
programme.desc: Ryan Reynolds assembles "The Superzeros," a team of somewhat pitiful animals with unexpectedly awesome superpowers. Forget about the cheetahs speed and the eagles eyesight; and say hello to the invisible glass frog, the indestructible honey badger and the might of the pistol shrimp who can fire bubbles hotter than the sun.

programme.title: Underdogs
programme.desc: Forget the birds and the bees, Ryan reveals the steps to finding "the one," underdog style. From first attraction in giant-nosed proboscis monkeys to the importance of wingmen in turkey courtship or even foreplay with flying foxes, these animals are rewriting the rule book on messy and complicated relationships in the animal kingdom.

programme.title: Underdogs
programme.desc: Ryan Reynolds reveals some highly questionable parenting strategies from the animal kingdoms worst parents, the underdogs. From a goose who lays their eggs on the top of a cliff to a koala that feeds its baby poop, its uncertain if they bad parents or just misunderstood. But no matter how bad one thinks they may be at parenting; they cant be as bad as these guys.

programme.title: Underdogs
programme.desc: Ryan Reynolds puts the spotlight on the underdogs who get ahead by dishonest means. From the master-of-disguise frogfish to a butt-biting jackal and a multiheaded caterpillar playing the decoy, they are the masters of deception and deceit. And bringing all these hustlers together is the greatest con artist of them all - a cunning macaque who feeds on the spoils from unsuspecting tourists.

programme.title: The Incredible Dr. Pol
programme.desc: Reality show follows Dutch-born veterinarian Jan Pol, his family and employees everyday. Jan Pol and his wife Diane started their own practice in Weidman, Michigan, Pol Veterinary Services, back in in 1981. Dr Pol takes a good care of every family pet and head of livestock no matter what size or condition and is a true legend in the community. Dr Pol has seen it all, treating numerous patients every single day, his daily routine is more than 12 hours but nothing can stop him from being devoted to his patients.

programme.title: Mara: Rebirth
programme.desc: The Emergence. Part 1 of our series starts with the dust of the disappearing migration as it heads off across the river and leaves. Behind them, hundreds if not thousands of other animals cannot move because they are locked into territories.

programme.title: Built to Survive
programme.desc: Phil Breslin visits the savannah for an encounter with Australias largest predatory bird, a wedge-tailed Eagle, one of the worlds most venomous snakes - the coastal taipan and a real-life dragon - the frill-necked lizard.

programme.title: Hunt for the Giant Squid
programme.desc: The giant squid is perhaps one of the most mysterious animals on the planet. Our attempts to find it and observe it in the wild have more or less failed. Are we missing something obvious? With the help of completely new cameras, and logic driven investigation, we think we know where and how to look. We really can shine some light on the enduring mystery of the giant squid - and perhaps even find one. Hunt for the Giant Squid will be a magical mystery tour through the some of the most unbelievable scenes nature has to offer: Glowing and flashing of living organisms - bioluminescence - that will lead us from shallow reefs to the realm of the giant squid.

programme.title: Prairie Dog Manor
programme.desc: Follow the exploits of these cute creatures from northern New Mexico. "Prairie Dog Manor" showcases the unique behaviour of these special animals and highlights the different relationships that exist between the clan members from Valles Caldera National Preserve. Further episodes explore the mating season when the warm weather arrives and battles commence between the males to earn the right to mate with the females. Soon, the females are pregnant and new pups arrive and the whole cycle starts again.

programme.title: Prairie Dog Manor
programme.desc: Follow the exploits of these cute creatures from northern New Mexico. programme.title: Wild Mongolia: Land of Extremes
programme.desc: Landlocked and bordering both China and Russia, Mongolia is a land of extreme habitats. From the challenging environment of the Gobi desert situated on a mounain plateau to the vast grasslands of the Mongolian Steppe, from the Altai mountains to the Taiga forest in the north of the country, this land is home to some of the hardiest and most resilient animals on the planet. The show explores the topography these distinct environments and chronicles how the wildlife has evolved and adapted so that they can either live with littel access to water or else become totally dependent on grass for their survival.

programme.title: Hunters of the Reef
programme.desc: National Geographic Wild. Tropical coral reefs are the picture of colorful tranquility, but thats a divers perspective. To the scaly and gilled inhabitants, its an environment ruled by pods of dolphins who prowl the area while everyone else runs for cover.

programme.title: Chinas Wild Empire
programme.desc: Every year, tens of thousands of female Tibetan antelope migrate from their winter feeding and mating grounds to their summer birthing grounds, high on the Tibetan plateau. With extreme landscapes and ever-changing weather, its a monumental journey of endurance fraught with danger, especially with wolves shadowing their every move.

programme.title: Wild Mongolia: Land of Extremes
programme.desc: Landlocked and bordering both China and Russia, Mongolia is a land of extreme habitats. From the challenging environment of the Gobi desert situated on a mounain plateau to the vast grasslands of the Mongolian Steppe, from the Altai mountains to the Taiga forest in the north of the country, this land is home to some of the hardiest and most resilient animals on the planet. programme.title: Hunters of the Reef
programme.desc: National Geographic Wild. Tropical coral reefs are the picture of colorful tranquility, but thats a divers perspective. To the scaly and gilled inhabitants, its an environment ruled by pods of dolphins who prowl the area while everyone else runs for cover.

programme.title: Killer Whale Chronicles
programme.desc: Orcas are the rulers of the seas. These majestic marine mammals have captured the hearts of people with their intelligence and complex family structures. However, since killer whales started attacking boats near Gibraltar, many are asking: Are they threatening us or just playing? The central revelation is that orcas, with specialized "cultures," perfectly exploit the richness of the seas. Surprisingly, there are different orca cultures around the globe. This episode also showcases impressive images of how the curious whales create genuine "fashions," and meet for mating. Their family groups are led by experienced matriarchs who maintain lifelong bonds with their offspring, particularly their sons. Singer and orca enthusiast Sarah Connor lends her voice to the documentary, giving the orcas stories a special depth.

programme.title: Killer Whale Chronicles
programme.desc: A central theme of this episode is the remarkable learning behavior of orcas, passed on from generation to generation. As marine biologist and wildlife filmmaker Florian Graner explores the mysteries of orcas, viewers immerse themselves in the different cultures of the orca populations in the Salish Sea. Singer and orca enthusiast Sarah Connor lends the documentary a special depth with her narration and takes viewers on a journey into the world of the largest members of the dolphin family. The documentary sheds light on the fascinating world of the black-and-white giants of the seas, their intelligence, complex social structures, and their impressive ability to pass on knowledge from generation to generation.

programme.title: Chinas Wild Empire
programme.desc: Every year, tens of thousands of female Tibetan antelope migrate from their winter feeding and mating grounds to their summer birthing grounds, high on the Tibetan plateau. With extreme landscapes and ever-changing weather, its a monumental journey of endurance fraught with danger, especially with wolves shadowing their every move.

programme.title: Chinas Wild Empire
programme.desc: Chinas Asian elephants play a crucial role in the health and diversity of the rainforests of Yunnan. But with the human population growing, life is getting tougher for these majestic beasts. Over the course of a year, we follow a mother elephant as she teaches her calf how to survive in their natural habitat, while another herd undertakes a marathon journey.

programme.title: Lion Brothers: Cubs To Kings
programme.desc: A male lion cub is born into a powerful pride and quickly establishes his dominance over his siblings. But after a fight with his father, he is immediately banished from the pride. How will he cope with the brutal reality of the African savannah

programme.title: Ultimate Rivals: Cats vs. Dogs
programme.desc: Ultimate Rivals: Cats v. Dogs examines the age-old relationship and rivalry between these companions and competitors. Having lived side-by-side in Africa for hundreds of thousands of years, these different canine and feline creatures know each other extremely well. From wild dogs to lions, hyenas to leopards, and jackals to cheetahs, these animals all have to compete for limited food resources and territory in their attempts at survival. And so they end up stealing from each other, eating each others young, going after the same prey with each of them use their unique talents to secure the upper hand. However difficult the circumsances, these two rival species will always be survivors in the wild.

programme.title: Wild Mongolia: Land of Extremes
programme.desc: Landlocked and bordering both China and Russia, Mongolia is a land of extreme habitats. From the challenging environment of the Gobi desert situated on a mounain plateau to the vast grasslands of the Mongolian Steppe, from the Altai mountains to the Taiga forest in the north of the country, this land is home to some of the hardiest and most resilient animals on the planet. The show explores the topography these distinct environments and chronicles how the wildlife has evolved and adapted so that they can either live with littel access to water or else become totally dependent on grass for their survival.

programme.title: Chinas Wild Empire
programme.desc: Chinas Asian elephants play a crucial role in the health and diversity of the rainforests of Yunnan. But with the human population growing, life is getting tougher for these majestic beasts. Over the course of a year, we follow a mother elephant as she teaches her calf how to survive in their natural habitat, while another herd undertakes a marathon journey.

programme.title: Lion Brothers: Cubs To Kings
programme.desc: A male lion cub is born into a powerful pride and quickly establishes his dominance over his siblings. But after a fight with his father, he is immediately banished from the pride. How will he cope with the brutal reality of the African savannah

programme.title: Chinas Wild Empire
programme.desc: Every year, tens of thousands of female Tibetan antelope migrate from their winter feeding and mating grounds to their summer birthing grounds, high on the Tibetan plateau. With extreme landscapes and ever-changing weather, its a monumental journey of endurance fraught with danger, especially with wolves shadowing their every move.

programme.title: Hunters of the Reef
programme.desc: National Geographic Wild. Tropical coral reefs are the picture of colorful tranquility, but thats a divers perspective. To the scaly and gilled inhabitants, its an environment ruled by pods of dolphins who prowl the area while everyone else runs for cover.

programme.title: Killer Whale Chronicles
programme.desc: Orcas are the rulers of the seas. These majestic marine mammals have captured the hearts of people with their intelligence and complex family structures. However, since killer whales started attacking boats near Gibraltar, many are asking: Are they threatening us or just playing? The central revelation is that orcas, with specialized "cultures," perfectly exploit the richness of the seas. Surprisingly, there are different orca cultures around the globe. This episode also showcases impressive images of how the curious whales create genuine "fashions," and meet for mating. Their family groups are led by experienced matriarchs who maintain lifelong bonds with their offspring, particularly their sons. Singer and orca enthusiast Sarah Connor lends her voice to the documentary, giving the orcas stories a special depth.

programme.title: Killer Whale Chronicles
programme.desc: A central theme of this episode is the remarkable learning behavior of orcas, passed on from generation to generation. As marine biologist and wildlife filmmaker Florian Graner explores the mysteries of orcas, viewers immerse themselves in the different cultures of the orca populations in the Salish Sea. Singer and orca enthusiast Sarah Connor lends the documentary a special depth with her narration and takes viewers on a journey into the world of the largest members of the dolphin family. The documentary sheds light on the fascinating world of the black-and-white giants of the seas, their intelligence, complex social structures, and their impressive ability to pass on knowledge from generation to generation.

programme.title: Wild Mongolia: Land of Extremes

programme.title: Europes Wild Marvels
programme.desc: With leopards in its mountains, blue whales off its coasts, and foxes roaming its city centres, Europe is a continent full of wild surprises. From the frozen glaciers of Iceland to the lush islands of the Azores, and from the rugged peaks of the Caucasus to the metropolis of London, the first episode in this stunning series highlights Europes astonishing diversity, all shot with breath-taking brio and the latest technology to reveal the continent and its animals in all its breath-taking glory.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Dora atgriežas ar jauniem, fantastiskiem piedzīvojumiem maģiskajā lietus mežā! Pievienojies visīpašākajam bērnam - pētniekam un viņas labākajam draugam Zābaciņam, kad viņi satiek jaunus draugus! Nekas nav neiespējams! Aiziet!

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Zābaciņš un Dora dodas uz Banānkalnu, lai nogādātu Isai dāvanu - Zābaciņa apgleznotu puķu podu! Dora kopā ar draugiem rīko dzimšanas dienas pārsteiguma ballīti Garnadzim. Ceļā uz svinībām Garnadzis mēģina nočiept pats savu dāvanu!

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Pēkšņi pa nakti pazudušas Barbazū skaistās rozes. Viņš ir drošs, ka vainīga Barbabella. Bet kā lai piedabū viņu atzīties? Barbazū viņai iedod jaunu lelli, kas viņu labāk pieskatīs. // Bērni ģimenes albumā ierauga Lolitas bērnības foto. Barbatētis tādēļ nolemj bērniem pastāstīt par to, kā viņš un Lolita reiz devās ekspedīcijā uz Arktiku.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Bērni pirmoreiz brauks ar vilcienu un nakšņos viesnīcā. Mamma būs ar viņiem, bet tētis atsevišķi vedīs paštaisītos izstrādājumus. Viņiem jāpārdod savi darbiņi ikgadējā lielajā tirdziņā, ja tētis paspēs laicīgi... // Uzsniga sniegs un bērni sarīkoja pikošanos, bet Barbabo uzcēla lielisku sniegavīru. Bet kā lai viņu saglabā, kad paliks siltāks? Sākas sacensības ar laiku...

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Ķīmiskas villas padara lauku apvidu rožainu. Barbapapas uzbūvē putnu māju, lai pasargātu sasirgušos putnus. Ieraugot piesārņotu pludmali, Barbapapu ģimene izlemj to uzkopt. No drazām top mini golfa laukums.

programme.title: Tims Rekss kosmosā
programme.desc: Tims, Tomijs un Tija nevar izlemt, ko dāvināt omītei. Tims uzņem pats savu Kapteiņa Dinozvaigznes filmu. Tims izliekas, lai pierādītu, ka ir tikpat foršs, cik Kajas brālēns.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Vecmamma rāda Dorai fotoalbumu ar putnu bildēm. Tomēr albumā vēl trūkst Fiksadū fotogrāfijas. Dora apņemas atrast un nofotografēt ašo putnu. Dora un Zābaciņš palīdz papagailēnam atgriezties mājās - taču ceļā putnēns nebeidz mēdīties!

programme.title: Bleizs un automonstri
programme.desc: Bleizs un automonstri ir interaktīvs seriāls datorgrafikā par Bleizu, lieliskāko automonstru pasaulē, tā vadītāju astoņgadīgu zēnu vārdā Eidžejs un viņu piedzīvojumiem Asupilī. Asupilī nav lielākas zvaigznes par Bleizu. Viņš ir čempions sacīkšu trasē un varonis ārpus tās. Kad vien ir kāda ķibele, visi vēršas pie viņa, jo zina, ka Bleizs spēj to, ko nespēj citas mašīnas. Viņš ir ātrākais automonstrs pilsētā - viņam piemīt bliezienātrums! Liekot lietā savas zināšanas, Bleizs spēj tikt galā ar jebkādu izaicinājumu. Ja situācija kļūst sarežģīta, viņš spēj iztēloties sevi par jebkuru mašīnu, pārvērsties par to un pavisam viegli atrisināt ikvienu problēmu.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Barbabravo kā slepenais aģents vada izmeklēšanu, bruņojies ar saviem rīkiem, lai uzzinātu, kurš nozaga Barbatēta torti. Barbalala ir pārliecināta, ka dzirdēja milzu vistu klīstam pa māju. Barbabērni stāv sardzē.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Pēc sniegota pārsteiguma pienākšanas, Rabla komanda piedāvā palīdzēt Hedlija viesnīcā. Kad kāpnes izrādās nepietiekami ātras, ir laiks celt.

programme.title: Ķepu patruļa
programme.desc: "Ķepu patruļa" ir seriāls pirmsskolas vecuma bērniem, kura galvenie varoņi ir seši varonīgi kucēni Čeiss, Māršals, Rokijs, Zuma, Rabls un Skaja, kuru saimnieks ir tehnoloģijas pārzinošais 10 gadus vecais zēns Raiders. Viņiem ir unikālas problēmu risināšanas spējas, stilīgi braucamrīki un daudz kucēniem raksturīga mīļa humora. "Kepu patruļa" dodas bīstamās glābšanas misijās, lai Piedzīvojumu līča iedzīvotāji būtu drošībā. Māršals – suns ugunsdzējs, Čeiss – suns policists, Skaja, kura lido savā helikopterā, un citi – katram kucēnam ir sava īpaša personība un spējas, atspoguļojot kopīga darba un pilsoniskās atbildības nozīmību. Viņiem visiem uz muguras ir īpašas mugursomas, lai viņi būtu spējīgi paveikt visu, sākot no kaķēnu glābšanas līdz vilciena apturēšanai, neļaujot tam nokrist no klints. Lai cik liels būtu piedzīvojums, "Ķepu patruļai" vienmēr atliek laiks spēlēm, jautrībai un tam, lai Raiders pakasa aiz auss. Interesants "Ķepu patruļas" fakts – Raders izglāba visus kucēnus un iemācīja tiem viņu spējas.

Pepas iecienītākās nodarbes ir rotaļāšanās, pārģērbšanās un lēkāšana pa dubļainām peļķēm, un viņas jautrie piedzīvojumi vienmēr beidzas ar skaļiem smieklu rukšķiem.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Barbabo, Barbabella un Barbagudrais uzbūvē māju kokā. Barbamamma ir apņēmusies novērst piesārņojumu.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Barbalala saņem paciņu ar rozā zvēriņiem, ko nosauc par Skvīkijiem. Barbabravo, Barbalala un Barbabo ir apnicis, ka brāļi un māsas par viņiem smejas.

programme.title: Haizivsuns
programme.desc: Kad komanda cenšas izvest mazuļus tautās, tie sāk trakot un neviens nespēj saprast, kā viņus apturēt.

programme.title: Haizivsuns
programme.desc: Megamute izbēg no mājas un Makss un Haizivsuns meklē viņu pa visu Fogijspringsu.

programme.title: Haizivsuns
programme.desc: Komanda ar Barbas kuģi dodas atgriezt haizivsuņus salā.

programme.title: Bleizs un automonstri
programme.desc: Bleizs un automonstri ir interaktīvs seriāls datorgrafikā par Bleizu, lieliskāko automonstru pasaulē, tā vadītāju astoņgadīgu zēnu vārdā Eidžejs un viņu piedzīvojumiem Asupilī. Asupilī nav lielākas zvaigznes par Bleizu. Viņš ir čempions sacīkšu trasē un varonis ārpus tās. Kad vien ir kāda ķibele, visi vēršas pie viņa, jo zina, ka Bleizs spēj to, ko nespēj citas mašīnas. Viņš ir ātrākais automonstrs pilsētā - viņam piemīt bliezienātrums! Liekot lietā savas zināšanas, Bleizs spēj tikt galā ar jebkādu izaicinājumu. Ja situācija kļūst sarežģīta, viņš spēj iztēloties sevi par jebkuru mašīnu, pārvērsties par to un pavisam viegli atrisināt ikvienu problēmu.

programme.title: Bleizs un automonstri
programme.desc: Bleizs un automonstri ir interaktīvs seriāls datorgrafikā par Bleizu, lieliskāko automonstru pasaulē, tā vadītāju astoņgadīgu zēnu vārdā Eidžejs un viņu piedzīvojumiem Asupilī. programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabls ar komandu pārvācas uz Celtnieklīci, kur viņi dzīvo, spēlējas un būvē visu, kas vien nepieciešams.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Kad futbola laukumā sarodas trušu ģimene, Rabla komanda liek lietā prasmes un izdomā jaunu sportu - trušbolu!

programme.title: Ķepu patruļa
programme.desc: "Ķepu patruļa" ir seriāls pirmsskolas vecuma bērniem, kura galvenie varoņi ir seši varonīgi kucēni Čeiss, Māršals, Rokijs, Zuma, Rabls un Skaja, kuru saimnieks ir tehnoloģijas pārzinošais 10 gadus vecais zēns Raiders. Viņiem ir unikālas problēmu risināšanas spējas, stilīgi braucamrīki un daudz kucēniem raksturīga mīļa humora. "Kepu patruļa" dodas bīstamās glābšanas misijās, lai Piedzīvojumu līča iedzīvotāji būtu drošībā. Māršals – suns ugunsdzējs, Čeiss – suns policists, Skaja, kura lido savā helikopterā, un citi – katram kucēnam ir sava īpaša personība un spējas, atspoguļojot kopīga darba un pilsoniskās atbildības nozīmību. Viņiem visiem uz muguras ir īpašas mugursomas, lai viņi būtu spējīgi paveikt visu, sākot no kaķēnu glābšanas līdz vilciena apturēšanai, neļaujot tam nokrist no klints. Lai cik liels būtu piedzīvojums, "Ķepu patruļai" vienmēr atliek laiks spēlēm, jautrībai un tam, lai Raiders pakasa aiz auss. Interesants "Ķepu patruļas" fakts – Raders izglāba visus kucēnus un iemācīja tiem viņu spējas.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Slēpošanas laikā Barbapapas uzceļ milzīgu iglū. Barbabravo and Barbalibs sacenšas drosmīgumā. Barbagudrais rada putekļu sūkšanas robotu, kas lieliski spēlē futbolu. Barbabērni sarīko spēli pret robotiem.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Barbagudrais pārklāj māju ar burvju produktu, lai novērstu ūdens sūci. Nākamajā dienā māja saplok kā balons. Putns uzvij ligzdu uz Barbazū vēdera. Barbazū grib kļūt par lieu koku, lai sniegtu patvērumu dzīvniekiem. Situācija kļūst sarežģīta.

programme.title: Tims Rekss kosmosā
programme.desc: Tims, Tija un Tomijs cenšas pārliecināt mammu un tēti par labu mīlulim.

programme.title: Tims Rekss kosmosā
programme.desc: Tims atbrīvojas no vecajām lietām, bet drīz saprot, ka ne visam vieta miskastē.

programme.title: Tims Rekss kosmosā
programme.desc: Tims un Kaja meklē pludmalē apraktos niekus.

programme.title: Tims Rekss kosmosā
programme.desc: Tomijs piedalās raķešu sacīkstēs, Tims atbalsta savu brāli.

programme.title: Tims Rekss kosmosā
programme.desc: Tims novērš Tijas domas no Taskija, kamēr tas mazgājas veļas mašīnā.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Dora ceļo pa lietusmežu, sacerot dziesmiņu tētim, lai kopā ar viņu nosvinētu Tēta un Doras dienu! Dora ir gatava Čurro fiestai, taču izrādās, ka visus našķus ir apēduši Pirātrukši. Dora dodas meklēt īpašu dārgumu lādi, kurā paslēpti zelta čurro.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Dora uzzina, ka viņas vecmamma nav svinējusi savus Pieaugšanas svētkus, un sarīko viņai pārsteiguma ballīti ar īpašu kleitu, diadēmu un kurpēm! Doras draugam Koko nav aizraujoša stāsta, ar ko izklaidēt biedrus, tāpēc viņi dodas pie Pastāstu koka!

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Vectēvs uzbūvējis vilcienu, ko nosaucis par "Ģertrūdi", un viņš ved Pepu un Džordžu izbraucienā. Ceļā viņi satiek viņu draugus, kas viņiem pievienojas. Pepa un Džordžs domā, ka "Ģertrūde" ir labākais vilciens pasaulē!

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Cūciņa Pepa ir mīļa, ziņkārīga un aktīva pirmsskolniece, kura kopā ar māmiņu, tēti un brālīti Džordžu ik dienu uzzina daudz ko jaunu un aizraujošu. programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Pepa un Džordžs šodien dodas uz trusītes Rebekas māju. Tā atšķiras no Pepas mājas. Tā ir kalnā, kurā kāpņu vietā ir tuneļi. Viņi spēlējas, un visi ir pārsteigti, kad Džordžs atklāj, ka viņam garšo burkāni.

programme.title: Haizivsuns
programme.desc: Maksam ir netipisks mīlulis - Haizivsuns, pa pusei haizivs, pa pusei suns. Sākumā Makss cenšas paturēt Haizivsuni noslēpumā, bet Fogijspringsā mīt viņa draugi, ziņkārīgi kaimiņi un pat Maksa vecāki tomēr pamanīs Maksa jauno labāko draugu.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Kad komanda uzbūvē īpašu limonādes stendu Lūkasam un Lilija, īgnais Ātrmeistars ieripina to Celtnieklīča ielās. Kāpēc bebrs Krančijs šķērso ceļu? Jo Rabla komanda būvē tiltu, lai palīdzētu viņam nokļūt ceļa otrā pusē.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Komanda izmanto milzīgos braucamos, lai palīdzētu Lūkasam un Lilijai dāvāt vecākiem lieliskāko kāzu gadadienu.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Kamēr ģimene veido keramikas izstrādājumus, Barbabravo un Barbagudrais mēģina uzstādīt pasaules rekordu ar siera suflē. Barbapapas nolemj doties uz parku. Kamēr brālis un māsa spēlējas, Barbaliba mēģina visu kontrolēt.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Barbazū gatavs palīdzēt, bet Barbagudrais un Barbabella ļaunprātīgi izmanto viņa labestību un padara viņu traku. Barbazū nejauši atklāj spēju atdarināt Barbatēti. Viņš to izmanto, lai sadalītu darbus brāļiem un māsām. Vai viņi to uzzinās?

programme.desc: Kamēr ģimene veido keramikas izstrādājumus, Barbabravo un Barbagudrais mēģina uzstādīt pasaules rekordu ar siera suflē. Barbapapas nolemj doties uz parku. Kamēr brālis un māsa spēlējas, Barbaliba mēģina visu kontrolēt.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Barbabērni atrod dīvainu alu. Barbaliba stāsta par alām, un par to pārtapšanu.

programme.title: Bleizs un automonstri
programme.desc: Bleizs un automonstri ir interaktīvs seriāls datorgrafikā par Bleizu, lieliskāko automonstru pasaulē, tā vadītāju astoņgadīgu zēnu vārdā Eidžejs un viņu piedzīvojumiem Asupilī. Asupilī nav lielākas zvaigznes par Bleizu. Viņš ir čempions sacīkšu trasē un varonis ārpus tās. Kad vien ir kāda ķibele, visi vēršas pie viņa, jo zina, ka Bleizs spēj to, ko nespēj citas mašīnas. Viņš ir ātrākais automonstrs pilsētā - viņam piemīt bliezienātrums! Liekot lietā savas zināšanas, Bleizs spēj tikt galā ar jebkādu izaicinājumu. Ja situācija kļūst sarežģīta, viņš spēj iztēloties sevi par jebkuru mašīnu, pārvērsties par to un pavisam viegli atrisināt ikvienu problēmu.

programme.title: Ķepu patruļa
programme.desc: "Ķepu patruļa" ir seriāls pirmsskolas vecuma bērniem, kura galvenie varoņi ir seši varonīgi kucēni Čeiss, Māršals, Rokijs, Zuma, Rabls un Skaja, kuru saimnieks ir tehnoloģijas pārzinošais 10 gadus vecais zēns Raiders. Viņiem ir unikālas problēmu risināšanas spējas, stilīgi braucamrīki un daudz kucēniem raksturīga mīļa humora. "Kepu patruļa" dodas bīstamās glābšanas misijās, lai Piedzīvojumu līča iedzīvotāji būtu drošībā. Māršals – suns ugunsdzējs, Čeiss – suns policists, Skaja, kura lido savā helikopterā, un citi – katram kucēnam ir sava īpaša personība un spējas, atspoguļojot kopīga darba un pilsoniskās atbildības nozīmību. Viņiem visiem uz muguras ir īpašas mugursomas, lai viņi būtu spējīgi paveikt visu, sākot no kaķēnu glābšanas līdz vilciena apturēšanai, neļaujot tam nokrist no klints. Lai cik liels būtu piedzīvojums, "Ķepu patruļai" vienmēr atliek laiks spēlēm, jautrībai un tam, lai Raiders pakasa aiz auss. Interesants "Ķepu patruļas" fakts – Raders izglāba visus kucēnus un iemācīja tiem viņu spējas.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Kad stirnai Podziņai jāšķērso Celtnieklīča lidostas skrejceļš, Rabls un komanda zina, kas jābūvē. Rabls un komanda uzbūvē milzu skrituļdēli tantes Celtnes un Rivera šovam. Taču, kad tas zaudē kontroli, suņiem jādzenas pakaļ!

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Fermeri Zoju piemeklē likstas - ražu apēd neatlaidīga vāvere.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Dora un Zābaciņš atrod apburošu aksolotla mazuli. Viņi dodas ceļā, lai nogādātu mazo nerātni mājās. Lielais Sarkanais Cālis iekļūst milzīgā burbulī, kurš viņu nes taisnā ceļā uz vulkānu! Lai viņu glābtu, arī Dorai nākas pacelties gaisā.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Isa rīko ballīti, kurā visi dejos Mūžameža ritmu. Ceļā uz svētkiem Zābaciņam jāpagūst iemācīties dejas soļus! Dora ar draugiem dodas uz Likstu un Lamatu Mežu, lai atrastu Tiko burvju riekstu, kurš spēj pārvērsties par ikviena mīļāko našķi.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Barbagudrais uztvēris melodiju no Marsa. Barbapapas būvē raķeti, lai dotos uz sarkano planētu. Ceļā uz Marsu Barbapapas sastop Barbamarsiešu ģimeni. Viņiem nav laika iepazīties, kad ciemam uzbrūk milzu augs.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Barbamazuļi atrod ziloņu mazuli un slepeni par to rūpējas. Kā Barbatētis un Barbamamma reaģēs uz Borisu? Zilonis Boriss ilgojas pēc mājām. Barbapapas nolemj vest viņu atpakaļ uz Āfriku. Turpat viņi palīdz Borisam pielāgoties.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Kurš gan negribētu zināt, par ko sapņo barbabērni, kamēr viņi mierīgi dus?

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Ķīmiskas villas padara lauku apvidu rožainu. Barbapapas uzbūvē putnu māju, lai pasargātu sasirgušos putnus. Ieraugot piesārņotu pludmali, Barbapapu ģimene izlemj to uzkopt. No drazām top mini golfa laukums.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Barbabo neprot zīmēt. Viņam piemetas žagas, no kurām netiek vaļā. Viņš jau grasās padoties, kad nejauši rada jaunu mākslas novirzienu. Barbaliba grib piedalīties rakstīšanas konkursā, taču brāļi un māsas neļauj koncentrēties.

programme.title: Tims Rekss kosmosā
programme.desc: Tomijs piedalās raķešu sacīkstēs, Tims atbalsta savu brāli. Tims novērš Tijas domas no Taskija, kamēr tas mazgājas veļas mašīnā. Bērni kļūst par vecākiem, un vecāki - par bērniem.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabla komanda uzbūvē māju vecā kokā - īstu štābiņu vairākos stāvos! Izbēg fermeres Zojas jaunās vistiņas, Rabla komandai darba pilnas rokas.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabls ar komandu pārvācas uz Celtnieklīci, kur viņi dzīvo, spēlējas un būvē visu, kas vien nepieciešams.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Dora, Zābaciņš, Giljermo un Isabela rotaļājas ārā, taču sākas lietus. Dora dvīņiem pastāsta, ka tādā laikā var laimēties ieraudzīt varavīksni. Varavīksne tiešām parādās, tomēr tai trūkst vairāku krāsu: zilās, sarkanās un dzeltenās! Dora dodas uz Isas dārzu, lai aizņemtos krāsas no košajām puķēm. Uzveikusi Garnadzi, Dora aiznes krāsas Varavīksnei, kura iepriecina dvīņus ar savu košo spožumu. // Zābaciņš ļoti lepojas ar savu krāsaino gumiju bumbu un vēlas to izmēģināt beisbola spēlē. Taču bumba aizlido tālu projām! Karte pastāsta, ka tā nonākusi Kaimiņu mežā, kur dzīvo Simtkāje Sintija. Zābaciņam ir bail uzrunāt daudzkājaino kaimiņieni, tomēr Dora viņu iedrošina. Galu galā Sintija labprāt atdod bumbu... un pat iesaistās draugu spēlē!

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Barbabērni sagatavo izrādi Barbamammai dzimšanas dienā. Kamēr Barbalala uzkopj, viņi sodas uz lunaparku, kur Barbabo iesprūst karuselī. Trīs atsevišķi stāsti saplūst kopā pagalma vidū.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Barbaliba, Barbalala un Barbabella pēc kārtas stāsta stāstu. Katra iekļauj tajā ko ļoti personīgu. Barbapapu ģimene pavada dienu pludmalē. Sadalījušies 2 komandās, barbabērni cīnās par smilšu pussalu.

programme.title: Tims Rekss kosmosā
programme.desc: Tims un Kaja meklē pludmalē apraktos niekus. Tims atbrīvojas no vecajām lietām, bet drīz saprot, ka ne visam vieta miskastē. Tims, Tija un Tomijs cenšas pārliecināt mammu un tēti par labu mīlulim.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Kucēni atrod dinozauru kaulus un nolemj uzcelt dinozauru muzeju. Kad Omars salauž kāju, kucēniem jānodrošina rampas, lai viņš tomēr spētu turpināt piegādāt pastu.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Karls adoptē kaķēnus. Kad viņi izraisa popkorna elli, Rabla komanda padara kafejnīcu kaķēniem draudzīgu.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Pepa un Džordžs dodas uz rotaļlaukumu. Tur ir arī Pepas draugi. Pepai patīk šūpoties, bet Džordžam ne, jo viņš baidās no augstuma. Tāpēc tētis palīdz Džordžam nošļūkt no kalniņa. Tas ir par augstu, un viņš iesprūst.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Dvīņi ciemojas Barbagudrā istabā. Kādus sapņus sasniegtu, ja es būtu miljardieris?

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Ceļojumā uz Parīzi ģimene apskatīs lielisko Luvru. Diemžēl Barbalala neievēro strikto noteikumu - muzejā neēst. // Barbalala strikti ievēro ačgārnās dienas tradīcijas, kas cēlušās no seniem laikiem. Brāļi un māsas pievienojas viņai ačgārnajā dienā.

programme.title: Haizivsuns
programme.desc: Komandai jāatgriež mazuļus viņu dzimtajā vidē, bet vai Haizivsuns spēs no tiem atvadīties?

programme.title: Haizivsuns
programme.desc: Maksam ir netipisks mīlulis - Haizivsuns, kurš ir pa pusei haizivs, pa pusei suns. Sākumā Makss cenšas paturēt Haizivsuni noslēpumā, bet Fogijspringsā draugi, ziņkārīgi kaimiņi un pat Maksa vecāki ar laiku pamanīs Maksa jauno, rotaļīgo labāko draugu.

programme.title: Bleizs un automonstri
programme.desc: Bleizs un automonstri ir interaktīvs seriāls datorgrafikā par Bleizu, lieliskāko automonstru pasaulē, tā vadītāju astoņgadīgu zēnu vārdā Eidžejs un viņu piedzīvojumiem Asupilī. Asupilī nav lielākas zvaigznes par Bleizu. Viņš ir čempions sacīkšu trasē un varonis ārpus tās. Kad vien ir kāda ķibele, visi vēršas pie viņa, jo zina, ka Bleizs spēj to, ko nespēj citas mašīnas. Viņš ir ātrākais automonstrs pilsētā - viņam piemīt bliezienātrums! Liekot lietā savas zināšanas, Bleizs spēj tikt galā ar jebkādu izaicinājumu. Ja situācija kļūst sarežģīta, viņš spēj iztēloties sevi par jebkuru mašīnu, pārvērsties par to un pavisam viegli atrisināt ikvienu problēmu.

programme.title: Bleizs un automonstri

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabls ar komandu pārvācas uz Celtnieklīci, kur viņi dzīvo, spēlējas un būvē visu, kas vien nepieciešams.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabls ar komandu pārvācas uz Celtnieklīci, kur viņi dzīvo, spēlējas un būvē visu, kas vien nepieciešams.

programme.title: Ķepu patruļa
programme.desc: "Ķepu patruļa" ir seriāls pirmsskolas vecuma bērniem, kura galvenie varoņi ir seši varonīgi kucēni Čeiss, Māršals, Rokijs, Zuma, Rabls un Skaja, kuru saimnieks ir tehnoloģijas pārzinošais 10 gadus vecais zēns Raiders. Viņiem ir unikālas problēmu risināšanas spējas, stilīgi braucamrīki un daudz kucēniem raksturīga mīļa humora. "Kepu patruļa" dodas bīstamās glābšanas misijās, lai Piedzīvojumu līča iedzīvotāji būtu drošībā. Māršals – suns ugunsdzējs, Čeiss – suns policists, Skaja, kura lido savā helikopterā, un citi – katram kucēnam ir sava īpaša personība un spējas, atspoguļojot kopīga darba un pilsoniskās atbildības nozīmību. Viņiem visiem uz muguras ir īpašas mugursomas, lai viņi būtu spējīgi paveikt visu, sākot no kaķēnu glābšanas līdz vilciena apturēšanai, neļaujot tam nokrist no klints. Lai cik liels būtu piedzīvojums, "Ķepu patruļai" vienmēr atliek laiks spēlēm, jautrībai un tam, lai Raiders pakasa aiz auss. Interesants "Ķepu patruļas" fakts – Raders izglāba visus kucēnus un iemācīja tiem viņu spējas.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Jauni piedzīvojumi ar DORU! Pievienojies drošajai pasaules pētītājai Dorai un viņas labākajam draugam Zābaciņam viņu kopīgajos ceļojumos pa maģisko lietusmežu, kurā var notikt - un notiek - brīnumu lietas. Lets go!

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Arvien jauni piedzīvojumi ar Doru! Piebiedrojies drošajai pētniecei Dorai un viņas labākajam draugam Zābaciņam viņu brīnumainajos piedzīvojumos - no došanās palīgā dzīvniekiem kopā ar Djego līdz apburtas nāru pasaules glābšanai.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Aita Sūzija izdomājusi draugu Lauvu Leo. Pepa neredz Leo, bet Sūzija saka, ka Leo patīk rēkt un pārģērbties. Pepa nolemj, ka tagad viņa redz Leo. Pat mamma un tētis tagad spēlē līdzi. Džordžs jūtas atstumts.

programme.title: Rabla komanda

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Kad Megameistars izaicina mēru Greitveju piedalīties triku sacensībās, Rabla komanda būvē satriecošas triku rampas.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Barbabērni domā, ka ēdiens spēj likt tiem mainīt krāsu un formu, tāpēc izlemj atrast katram piemēroto ēdienu. Barbabo nav iedvesmas, tāpēc vairs nespēj radīt. Visa ģimene palīdz, iesakot jaunas zīmējumu tēmas.

programme.desc: The Barbabērni nakšņo viesistabā. Bailēs no skapī mītošajiem briesmoņiem, viņi izliek ērmotus slazdus, lai noķertu tos.

programme.title: Bleizs un automonstri
programme.desc: Bleizs un automonstri ir interaktīvs seriāls datorgrafikā par Bleizu, lieliskāko automonstru pasaulē, tā vadītāju astoņgadīgu zēnu vārdā Eidžejs un viņu piedzīvojumiem Asupilī. Asupilī nav lielākas zvaigznes par Bleizu. Viņš ir čempions sacīkšu trasē un varonis ārpus tās. Kad vien ir kāda ķibele, visi vēršas pie viņa, jo zina, ka Bleizs spēj to, ko nespēj citas mašīnas. Viņš ir ātrākais automonstrs pilsētā - viņam piemīt bliezienātrums! Liekot lietā savas zināšanas, Bleizs spēj tikt galā ar jebkādu izaicinājumu. Ja situācija kļūst sarežģīta, viņš spēj iztēloties sevi par jebkuru mašīnu, pārvērsties par to un pavisam viegli atrisināt ikvienu problēmu.

programme.title: Ķepu patruļa
programme.desc: "Ķepu patruļa" ir seriāls pirmsskolas vecuma bērniem, kura galvenie varoņi ir seši varonīgi kucēni Čeiss, Māršals, Rokijs, Zuma, Rabls un Skaja, kuru saimnieks ir tehnoloģijas pārzinošais 10 gadus vecais zēns Raiders. Viņiem ir unikālas problēmu risināšanas spējas, stilīgi braucamrīki un daudz kucēniem raksturīga mīļa humora. "Kepu patruļa" dodas bīstamās glābšanas misijās, lai Piedzīvojumu līča iedzīvotāji būtu drošībā. Māršals – suns ugunsdzējs, Čeiss – suns policists, Skaja, kura lido savā helikopterā, un citi – katram kucēnam ir sava īpaša personība un spējas, atspoguļojot kopīga darba un pilsoniskās atbildības nozīmību. Viņiem visiem uz muguras ir īpašas mugursomas, lai viņi būtu spējīgi paveikt visu, sākot no kaķēnu glābšanas līdz vilciena apturēšanai, neļaujot tam nokrist no klints. Lai cik liels būtu piedzīvojums, "Ķepu patruļai" vienmēr atliek laiks spēlēm, jautrībai un tam, lai Raiders pakasa aiz auss. Interesants "Ķepu patruļas" fakts – Raders izglāba visus kucēnus un iemācīja tiem viņu spējas.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Celtnieklīcim vajadzīga pasta nodaļa! Bet, kad celtni apsēž vāveres, suņiem jāizdomā risinājums. Rabla komanda izmanto savas būvniecības prasmes, lai pārveidotu super auto mazgātavu un nomazgātu fermeres Zojas sušķīgos dzīvniekus.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Ar steigu jāuzbūvē liels dambis, kas pilsētu pasargās no plūdiem.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Dora rāda dvīņiem mūzikas lādīti, kuras mazā dejotāja atdzīvojas! Kad aizbēg viņas burvju zābaciņi, draugi dodas tos meklēt. Saule nevar iemigt, tāpēc atsakās norietēt! Dorai jāatrod Spilvenmākonis, lai Saule varētu doties pie miera.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Dorai, Zābaciņam un Benijam jādodas cauri lietusmežam, lai nogādātu Benija vecmammai lielu, skaistu piena kūku. Dora palīdz Fiestas trio noskaidrot, kas rada skaļo, savādo troksni, kura dēļ viņi pazaudējuši savus instrumentus.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Barbabērni laimē skārienpaliktni. Visi grab to izmantot, tāpēc čiepj viens pēc otra. Barbazū krāj ūsainu slavenību bildes. Diemžēl nekur nevar atrast pēdējo: Čārlzu Pakavu-Ūsaini. Viņam ir aizdomas par sazvērestību...

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Barbabo aizmirsa nodot bibliotēkas grāmatu. Bibliotekārs Misters Stingrais šodien ciemojas pie Barbatēta, tāpēc Barbabo izlemj aizbēgt. Barbamamma grib, lai barbabērni uzkopj savas istabas. Viņi slēpjas, lai izvairītos no garlaicīgā darba.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Slēpošanas laikā Barbapapas uzceļ milzīgu iglū. Barbabravo and Barbalibs sacenšas drosmīgumā. Barbagudrais rada putekļu sūkšanas robotu, kas lieliski spēlē futbolu. Barbabērni sarīko spēli pret robotiem.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Barbagudrais pārklāj māju ar burvju produktu, lai novērstu ūdens sūci. Nākamajā dienā māja saplok kā balons. Putns uzvij ligzdu uz Barbazū vēdera. Barbazū grib kļūt par lieu koku, lai sniegtu patvērumu dzīvniekiem. Situācija kļūst sarežģīta.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Kurš gan negribētu zināt, par ko sapņo barbabērni, kamēr viņi mierīgi dus?

programme.desc: Rabls ar komandu pārvācas uz Celtnieklīci, kur viņi dzīvo, spēlējas un būvē visu, kas vien nepieciešams.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Barbabērni sagatavo izrādi Barbamammai dzimšanas dienā. Kamēr Barbalala uzkopj, viņi sodas uz lunaparku, kur Barbabo iesprūst karuselī. Trīs atsevišķi stāsti saplūst kopā pagalma vidū.

programme.title: Tims Rekss kosmosā
programme.desc: Tims izmēģina jaunus raķešzābakus, kas drīz kļūst nekontrolējami. Tims, Tomijs un Tija pieskata mēness papagaili. Tims, Tomijs un Tija sacenšas ar vecākiem astesbumbā.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Kad futbola laukumā sarodas trušu ģimene, Rabla komanda liek lietā prasmes un izdomā jaunu sportu - trušbolu!

programme.title: Victorious
programme.desc: Sitcom about a girl named Tori Vega and her life at an elite Hollywood performing arts high school. Cat hears that her favourite actress has passed away and wants to attend the funeral, taking Tori and Jade with her to San Diego. On the way, the girls encounter a few mishaps. Trina has been spreading rumours that she and Beck are going out together. To get back at her, Beck, Andre and Robbie pretend that they all want to date her - and teach her a lesson about telling lies.

programme.title: Sam and Cat
programme.desc: Sam and Cat is an American teen sitcom, a crossover spin-off of both iCarly and Victorious. Sam and Cat meet under very uncommon circumstances, become friends and then roommates. They want to start their own business to be more independent and become part-time babysitters. Since then their lives have completely changed and are filled with all kinds of comic situations and various unbelievable and curious adventures, as looking after kids is not easy. Watch young charges playing mischievous tricks on Sam and Cat and have fun!

programme.title: Tales of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: Raphaels brothers just dont understand him. Not only does he NEED to fight, hes really good at it, or at least thats what his new boxing trainer named Spuds told him. Spuds even ENCOURAGES Raph to work out his anger and negativity through fighting, even if his family and the annoying Pigeon Pete dont get it. But although the Turtles dont see eye to eye, they must work together to stop a rampaging Rocksteady and Bebop from wrecking the city! Social media blew up with videos of the two Mutanimals going berserk, fighting each other without seeming to know what was going on around them. And all the while, doing some serious damage to the city! As the dust settles, is there someone behind the whole plot, pulling the strings?

programme.title: Tales of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: All of Raphs wildest dreams are coming true in the underground Mutant Battle Arena! He gets to let loose, fighting the massive Mutanimals Bebop and Rocksteady; even the hug-loving Mondo Gecko joins in on the fun! Raph doesnt hold back, and he gets his butt kicked with a smile on his face. Not only that, hes getting some serious bling in exchange for being part of the fights - gold chains, new clothes, even his very own vehicle, the TURTLE TANK! This makes Donnie, Leo, and Mikey very suspicious, since Raph has kept everything a secret from them. But audiences love Raph, which pleases the crime boss Kitsune and her street gang, the Purple Dragons. They run the arena with the help of an obnoxious investor named Knox. But Raphs dream may become a nightmare, as Raph is oblivious to the fact that hes walked right into their trap!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob SquarePants is a cartoon series starring the yellow sea sponge Spongebob who lives deep in the ocean in the underwater town called Bikini Bottom. Together with his buddy the pink starfish Patrick, he experiences the craziest and most exciting adventures. Spongebob has a very energetic and optimistic character and works as a chef in restaurant "The Krusty Krab" where he makes the best burgers of the bottom of the sea.

But, unlike their friends and neighbours, Best and Bester have the unique ability to choose a new body every single day and, in doing so, experience life in a completely different way.

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: Phoebe and Max unwittingly let Chloes friends watch a horror movie and eat candy, leaving them traumatized and craving more sugar. Jinx and Boochs parents want to meet with Chloes parents to discuss the lack of supervision at the beach house. With Hank and Barb away, Max and Phoebe are determined to prove they can be good guardians, and use a disguise gadget to transform into their parents to help Chloe. It goes well until the real Hank and Barb show up, and must transform into Max and Phoebe to keep the ruse going.

programme.title: Danger Force
programme.desc: This fun spin-off of Henry Danger is set in the Swellview Academy for the Gifted and follows the adventures of four young friends. Chapa, Miles, Bose and Mika were ordinary kids, until they discovered they have superpowers. They are recruited by Captain Man to become his new crime-fighting crew, and protect the city of Swellview from various villains. But before that Captain Man must teach them how to control their superpowers, as well as to how to work as a team, using Schwoz as his helper.

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Henry Danger is a story about adventures of a 13-year-old Henry Hart who is lucky to become a helpmate of a super hero Captain Man. This is a real dream job of every teen. The newbie is getting paid for fighting against crime and helping to save the world. Brave Henry must hide his job from his family and friends and it is not that simple, but nothing can stop him from being a true crime-fighter. Henry himself wants to become a super hero one day, that is why he is constantly learning from Captain Man and is not scared of any hardships on the way to his dream.

programme.title: Tales of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: Leo, Raph, Donnie and Mikey emerge from the sewers to face challenges alongside April ONeil like never before. No matter the obstacle, these heroes in a half shell are ready for action with heart and a whole lot of humor.

programme.desc: In this crowded and chaotic household, Lincoln Loud is the only boy among his ten sisters. programme.title: The Loud House

Clyde is an only child by contrast, and is jealous of Lincolns abundance of siblings. Clyde also has a massive crush on Lori, who is Lincolns oldest sister. However, she has a boyfriend, Bobby. Bobby, although not being particularly intelligent, has several different jobs, ranging from life guard, to security at a shopping centre.

programme.title: Wylde Pak
programme.desc: Jack and Lily are half-siblings living on opposite ends of the world both hoping to have the "best summer ever." When dangerous events forces Jacks mom to send him to live with his dad, the kids fear their summer dreams have become a nightmare.

programme.title: Wylde Pak
programme.desc: Halmoni develops a special connection with a dog, Tofu, at the Groom and Board. When its time to return the freshly-groomed pup to his owners, she makes a split decision to go on the run with him instead! Min and Will must distract Tofus owners with runaway chicks while Lil and Jack go looking for Halmoni. They discover that Tofu resembles Halmonis beloved childhood dog, Dubu, whom she had to leave behind in Korea. Can they rescue Tofu - and will Halmoni get to say her proper goodbye? // Eager to prove himself, Jack volunteers to run the Groom and Board alone for the day. Its supposed to be a chill day with no appointments - but the phone wont stop ringing! Unable to say no, Jack ends up taking in a chaotic giant snake, and multiple smaller pets - whom the snake sees as her dinner. Jack struggles to protect the little pets (and Halmoni) from the jaws of death.

programme.title: Tyler Perrys Young Dylan
programme.desc: Hilarious television series, created by Tyler Perry, that follows the life and adventures of a street-smart kid and aspiring hip-hop artist Young Dylan. When Dylans grandmother Viola realizes that raising her grandson is too much to take on, she decides to send him to live indefinitely with her wealthy son Myles Wilson, his wife Yasmine and their two kids Rebecca and Charlie. Everyone will have to adapt to their new normal, and they will get themselves in lots of hilarious situations along the way. Dylan will teach his cousins about swag and street smarts, but he will soon learn that even rappers have rules in the Wilson house.

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: Chloe has been absent from school while on missions with her siblings, and is assigned summer school to make up her missing work. Max thinks its hilarious that she will have to spend the summer in school, until he is also informed that he will be the teacher. While they both pout about having to be in class all summer, Phoebe goes solo on some superhero mission. When a couple villains get the upper hand, a mysterious new superhero names Captain Perfect arrives to rescue her. Phoebe discovers that she and Captain Perfect have many of the same interests, and make a good crime-fighting team. As Phoebe wonders if she might have a new partner, Captain Perfect privately lets a contact know that he has earned Phoebes trust and is ready for the next phase of his assignment.

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: Max decides to surprise Phoebe on one of her solo missions, only to discover that she has been secretly teaming up with Captain Perfect. When Max hears Captain Perfect discuss his plans for the Thundermans with someone else, he realizes that the mystery supe is keeping a secret from them. After confronting Captain Perfect, the Thundermans are told by him and President Kickbutt that the new supe was sent to Secret Shores to spy on the twins, and to decide whether they should be allowed to stay on their mission. Meanwhile, Chloes crush invites her to his fathers product launch party at Splat By The Sea, at the same time Jinx and Booch want Chloe to protest the wealthy family outside the party. Unable to hurt anyones feelings, Chloe tries to use her powers to be in two places at once.

programme.title: Danger Force
programme.desc: This fun spin-off of Henry Danger is set in the Swellview Academy for the Gifted and follows the adventures of four young friends. Chapa, Miles, Bose and Mika were ordinary kids, until they discovered they have superpowers. They are recruited by Captain Man to become his new crime-fighting crew, and protect the city of Swellview from various villains. But before that Captain Man must teach them how to control their superpowers, as well as to how to work as a team, using Schwoz as his helper.

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Henry Danger is a story about adventures of a 13-year-old Henry Hart who is lucky to become a helpmate of a super hero Captain Man. This is a real dream job of every teen. The newbie is getting paid for fighting against crime and helping to save the world. Brave Henry must hide his job from his family and friends and it is not that simple, but nothing can stop him from being a true crime-fighter. Henry himself wants to become a super hero one day, that is why he is constantly learning from Captain Man and is not scared of any hardships on the way to his dream.

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: The school is looking for a new mascot, and Chloe and her new friends think they can make an impression by designing the winning entry. Meanwhile, Phoebe learns that Max has gotten them jobs at the school, but while he has a cushy Vice Principal job, she is the new Art teacher. Their argument over this leads to accidentally destroying it the new mascot costume. After Chloe discovers what theyve done and is furious with them, Max and Phoebe realize that being her guardian comes with more responsibility than they imagined.

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: New adventures for The Thundermans unfold after Phoebe and Max are sent undercover to handle a new threat in the seaside town of Secret Shores, and bring Chloe along to develop her superhero talent. While they investigate suspicious activity coming from the local school, Chloe forms a bond with two classmates, who dont realize their new friend has secret powers. As the danger increases, the Thunderman trio must stay in town indefinitely, leaving the squabbling twins in charge of raising their younger sister.

programme.title: iCarly
programme.desc: iCarly is about teenager Carly who produces her own web show named iCarly along with her three friends Freddie, Sam and Gibby. The show is broadcasted from a studio Carly constructed in the flat where she lives with her 29 years old brother and guardian Spencer. While producing a webshow Carly is not looking for fame or fortune. Ideally she wants to be a role model for children and teenagers. iCarly ultimately features everything from comedy sketches and talent contests to interviews, recipes, and problem-solving.

programme.title: Victorious
programme.desc: Victorious tells the story of the sixteen year old Tori Vega. She grows up in the shadow of her older sister Trina, the big star of the family. But this suddenly changes as Tori attends Hollywood Arts, the best high school of performing arts. Soon she finds out that it is difficult to find her way and be accepted by her fellow students. While Tori is a great singer, dancer and actress, she doesnt realise it. Gradually she finds out that she is a true entertainer and very talented.

programme.title: Sam and Cat
programme.desc: Sam and Cat is an American teen sitcom, a crossover spin-off of both iCarly and Victorious. Sam and Cat meet under very uncommon circumstances, become friends and then roommates. They want to start their own business to be more independent and become part-time babysitters. Since then their lives have completely changed and are filled with all kinds of comic situations and various unbelievable and curious adventures, as looking after kids is not easy. Watch young charges playing mischievous tricks on Sam and Cat and have fun!

programme.title: Tales of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: Raph is freaking out! He wanted to fight everyone, but now hes up against his brothers, and its the worst. Kitsune and her gang the Purple Dragons captured Mikey, Donnie, and Leo and used mind control devices to send them into the Mutant Battle Arena. They chase Raph through the arena and out to the street where he uses the Turtle Tank as a getaway car. Raph realizes hes in too deep and must turn to an unlikely source for help - the snobby Pigeon Pete! Together, they form a multi-step plan in which Pete will steal the mind control devices right from under the Purple Dragons noses while Raph distracts all the Mutants in the arena. But things dont go quite as planned and its up to Raph to save everyone he loves! Can he find a way to disarm the mind control devices and save everyone before its too late?

programme.title: Tales of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: Ray Fillet is attacked in Central Park by a mutant turtle! Donnies busy with his robotics project: turning Metalhead into a spider-bot. Wingnut bursts in and tells the Turtles to come quick- Ray is hurt! A woozy Ray blames the Ninja Turtles, and the Mutanimals start a fight with the confused brothers. But when Rays REAL attacker appears, a mutant snapping turtle named TOKKA, he fights everyone... until his watch starts beeping and he escapes. The Turtles tail him, ending up on the Staten Island ferry. After a big fight, Tokkas trapped. But while questioning him, Tokka explodes into OOZE, leaving only a baby turtle and his watch. Donnies brothers ask him to hack it and find clues about Tokka, which he says is impossible! Later, Donnie gets a location pin from Wingnut and follows it to an abandoned factory on Staten Island. He finds her and ANOTHER TOKKA that he cleverly takes out! Donnie thinks theyre safe until MORE Monster Mutanimals emerge! Could Donnies day get any worse?"

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: In this crowded and chaotic household, Lincoln Loud is the only boy among his ten sisters. With eleven children under one roof, things get a little bit crazy sometimes, to say the least. This childrens cartoon is fun and light-hearted, and Clyde, Lincolns best friend, only adds to that. Clyde is an only child by contrast, and is jealous of Lincolns abundance of siblings. Clyde also has a massive crush on Lori, who is Lincolns oldest sister. However, she has a boyfriend, Bobby. Bobby, although not being particularly intelligent, has several different jobs, ranging from life guard, to security at a shopping centre.

programme.title: Wylde Pak
programme.desc: Will and Min show Jack around to help him find a good story. Lily spills boba in Jacks suitcase and tries to hide the evidence. Jack tries to find "the big picture" as Lily shows him how to spend a perfect summer day in Canyon Valley.

programme.title: Tyler Perrys Young Dylan
programme.desc: Hilarious television series, created by Tyler Perry, that follows the life and adventures of a street-smart kid and aspiring hip-hop artist Young Dylan. When Dylans grandmother Viola realizes that raising her grandson is too much to take on, she decides to send him to live indefinitely with her wealthy son Myles Wilson, his wife Yasmine and their two kids Rebecca and Charlie. Everyone will have to adapt to their new normal, and they will get themselves in lots of hilarious situations along the way. Dylan will teach his cousins about swag and street smarts, but he will soon learn that even rappers have rules in the Wilson house.

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: Max and Phoebe start the process to impress Captain Perfect and save their mission, but they clash over their different styles. As Max sees that Phoebe worked better with Captain Perfect, he decides that he will also be better off with a new partner, and summons his friend Gideon from Hiddenville. Gideon doesnt fit the superhero mold, however, so Max uses one of his gadgets to give him size and strength. But the setting is off, and Max shrinks Gideon to the size of an ant, forcing him to locate and save his impossible-to-see friend before Phoebe and Captain Perfect discover what hes done. Meanwhile, Chloe asks Booch and Jinx to try their best to bond with new crush BC, so they pretend to be wealthy like his family.

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: Still eager to impress Captain Perfect, Max volunteers to help him with his younger sister, a headstrong girl who seems to drawn to evil. Max tries to show her the benefits of being good, but she tricks him and heads to auditions for new Mastermind henchmen. Max disguises himself and goes the auditions, too, hoping to stop her from working for a supervillain. Both he and the young girl are chosen to prove their evil and destroy Splat by Sea, but Max reveals his identity to her and talks her out of being a villain just before the restaurant is ruined. Meanwhile, Phoebe convinces BC he needs an elaborate dance-posal to ask Chloe to the school dance, but her interference does more harm than good.

programme.title: Danger Force
programme.desc: This fun spin-off of Henry Danger is set in the Swellview Academy for the Gifted and follows the adventures of four young friends. Chapa, Miles, Bose and Mika were ordinary kids, until they discovered they have superpowers. They are recruited by Captain Man to become his new crime-fighting crew, and protect the city of Swellview from various villains. But before that Captain Man must teach them how to control their superpowers, as well as to how to work as a team, using Schwoz as his helper.

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Henry Danger is a story about adventures of a 13-year-old Henry Hart who is lucky to become a helpmate of a super hero Captain Man. This is a real dream job of every teen. The newbie is getting paid for fighting against crime and helping to save the world. Brave Henry must hide his job from his family and friends and it is not that simple, but nothing can stop him from being a true crime-fighter. Henry himself wants to become a super hero one day, that is why he is constantly learning from Captain Man and is not scared of any hardships on the way to his dream.

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover

As the danger increases, the Thunderman trio must stay in town indefinitely, leaving the squabbling twins in charge of raising their younger sister.

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: Phoebe and Max unwittingly let Chloes friends watch a horror movie and eat candy, leaving them traumatized and craving more sugar. Jinx and Boochs parents want to meet with Chloes parents to discuss the lack of supervision at the beach house. With Hank and Barb away, Max and Phoebe are determined to prove they can be good guardians, and use a disguise gadget to transform into their parents to help Chloe. It goes well until the real Hank and Barb show up, and must transform into Max and Phoebe to keep the ruse going.

programme.title: Henry Danger

programme.title: iCarly
programme.desc: iCarly is about teenager Carly who produces her own web show named iCarly along with her three friends Freddie, Sam and Gibby. The show is broadcasted from a studio Carly constructed in the flat where she lives with her 29 years old brother and guardian Spencer. While producing a webshow Carly is not looking for fame or fortune. Ideally she wants to be a role model for children and teenagers. iCarly ultimately features everything from comedy sketches and talent contests to interviews, recipes, and problem-solving.

programme.title: Victorious
programme.desc: Sitcom about a girl named Tori Vega and her life at an elite Hollywood performing arts high school. A movie shoot down the street from Toris house means that she and Trina have to take the long way to school. After shaving Trinas legs and armpits, Tori does not want to drive the 40 minutes to school with her. Beck and a bunch of other girls get in a fight with Tori. Andres grandma causes trouble. Tori walks 11 miles to school and is chased by a beaver.

programme.title: Sam and Cat
programme.desc: Sam and Cat is an American teen sitcom, a crossover spin-off of both iCarly and Victorious. Sam and Cat meet under very uncommon circumstances, become friends and then roommates. They want to start their own business to be more independent and become part-time babysitters. Since then their lives have completely changed and are filled with all kinds of comic situations and various unbelievable and curious adventures, as looking after kids is not easy. Watch young charges playing mischievous tricks on Sam and Cat and have fun!

programme.title: Tales of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: Donnies trapped in a mad scientists lab by the Monster Mutanimals Tokka, Rahzar, Scale Tail, Antrax and Wyrm who are after Wingnuts blood. Meanwhile, Leo, Mikey and Raph try to get pizza but the shop owner is furious: theyve made a mess of the place too many times! But the Turtles have never been there before! Theyre confused until another Tokka wrecks the place in a huge fight before exploding into ooze...and then another Tokka arrives! In the lab, Donnie plans his escape but stumbles upon a video of Rahzar who explains the Monster Mutanimals are doomed unless they find the blood of a stable mutant... and they need Donatellos help! A real-life Rahzar lunges at Donnie, who fights him off until a whole pack of Monster Mutants shows up. The other three Turtles track their Tokka to the lab but are quickly captured. Donnie can only watch as his brothers are shoved into cages... and confronted by the creator of the Monster Mutanimals, the mad scientist Jordan Perry!

programme.title: Tales of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: Leo, Raph, Donnie and Mikey emerge from the sewers to face challenges alongside April ONeil like never before. When trouble oozes into the streets of New York City, the team finds themselves up against Mechazoids, street gangs, and even the storm of the century! No matter the obstacle, these heroes in a half shell are ready for action with heart and a whole lot of humor.
